description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Jam Showdown: Digatron
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Academy: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's School: Magical Castles Furniture Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster Wai Wai Party!!!!: Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 9
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero: Season Pass
description:
The DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Season Pass includes 3 DLC Packs for a total of more than 20 playable characters from the Dragon Ball SUPER: SUPER HERO movie and the Dragon Ball DAIMA.

As a Season Pass Bonus, you can summon Shenron to obtain items such as costumes or zeni. Additionally, the Season Pass Bonus also includes 3 days early access to the 3 DLC Packs.

name: Deadly Connection
description: Death in the VR world means death in reality... Are you brave enough to play?

name: The Fox Hare Disaster: Chapter One
description: Prepare to explore an abandoned mall from the 90’s in this first-person, psychological horror! Tackle puzzles and come face to face with the haunting creatures that lurk inside. Will you be able to make it out alive, or will you suffer the same fate as those who came before you…?

name: The Damn Psychiatric
description: The "San Lucas" psychiatric hospital, which was built in 1985 to help people with mental illnesses, became the scene of crimes and suspicious experiments in the year 2035. Patients mysteriously disappeared and some were found found dead in a strange way.

name: Vicera
description: Vicera is an online co-op game. Play as relic hunters, solving enigmatic mysteries and escaping a terrifying monster. Will you dare to face the darkness to find the cursed relics?

name: Killpaku!
description: A 3D action game where you control Bebe, a gluttonous monster. Aim at the weak points of the fighting "onis" and deal the final blow! Literally, enjoy picking the best parts!

name: Disciple
description: As a fledgling ascetic, you need to explore this vast world and collect rare and precious herbs to refine various elixirs.Players need to use their wisdom and skills, and accurately control the movement of the pills during refining according to the location of the pills on the distribution map.

name: Tsunagari Chess School
description: A psychological horror game taking place in a Japanese chess school. Get to know the girls, go on dates, and prepare for the worst.

name: Chained Survive Together
description: Sin descripción

name: Bandit Buster: Western
description: Bandit Buster: Western – Stop the Bandits, Save the Town, and Watch Out for Explosive Surprises!

name: Anime Girls: Natty Nurse
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Doom III
description: This mod let's you get back into the fight against evil and it's gameplay is modernized while still playing very much the way Doom and Doom II did.

name: Into Black
description:
A lone wanderer on the edge of space, a mystery as old as the universe itself, and one little robot who just wants to make the tea.
Into Black is a First-Person action adventure that takes you into the depths of a mysterious alien planet. Explore the endless darkness, mine valuable resources, and fight off alien beasts as you try to repair your ship and escape.

name: ATC Ground Point
description: Control the ground movement of airplanes at various airports. As the air traffic controller, ensure the airplanes move safely and get to the stand or runway on time.

name: Blood: Endless Pursuit
description: It's a horror game,you should press wasd to move and f to interact，with all the tools you find you can escape from the house and the glown.The enemy will chase you by your blood.The environment light is dark and you have initial iight surrounded yourself

name: InvisibleHand
description: In the bustling tavern, a variety of people are gathered. It's time to showcase true thieving skills!

name: OuJiang's Labyrinth Adventure
description: OuJiang's Labyrinth Adventure is an action-adventure game that features exploration of labyrinths, battles, and collecting, as well as a technical test of our Houdini-based level creation.There are various monsters, bosses, and props in the game. We hope everyone will enjoy our mini game!

name: Retro Robots 2D
description: Action Game. Robots, Space Ships, Moon Car, Motorbikes & Jet-Pack. Space War - Save the Humanity. Kill the Aliens and Enemy Robots. Complete the Missions.

name: Loot Stack: Relics Hunter
description: Explore ancient dungeons, uncover hidden treasures, and master the art of inventory management as you organize, stack, and collect precious relics in 25 scenarios. Can you find them all?

name: Path to the Goal
description: The protagonist, who aims to become a professional soccer player, sets out on a journey of training! Overcome various obstacles to become a professional soccer player!

name: Dagon: Complete Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the twisted world of H.P. Lovecraft and unearth the horrors that lie within.

name: Eggconsole Templo Del Sol: Asteka II PC-8801
description: Embark on an adventure set in the ancient ruins of Chichen Itza, where you'll explore the Temple of the Sun and search for the Solar Key.

name: Cheetahs Are Meant To Be Fast
description: An interactive storybook about how being a fat guy who eats a lot is very morally wrong and not at all awesome or attractive.

name: Zugnaex
description: Immerse yourself in Zugnaex. Compatible with DOOM and DOOM II, it blends classic FPS action with a modern user interface and a detailed heads-up display. Enjoy single-player campaigns and free* online multiplayer for epic battles. (* - requires DOOM)

name: Colony: Arena Online
description: Fight against rebel robots together with your friends and save planets from invasion....

name: Hentai Ami
description: Ami is an athletic girl who loves going to the gym, but she didn't know that a pervert who loves BDSM also trains there.

name: Spellagis
description: Spellagis is an arena-shooter and roguelite hybrid. Brave mages unite to prevent darkness and restore balance. By combining knowledge and artifacts, they engage in a battle where every step towards victory is deceptive and dangerous.

name: Days In Palis
description: Days in Palis is an immersive visual novel set in the fictional metropolis of "Palis." Players will experience passionate love stories and complex relationships centered around three female protagonists. By unlocking the plot, you'll gain a deeper understanding of their inner worlds.

name: Dreamstate
description: Dreamstate, can you survive your worst nightmare? In a point-and-click sit-and-survival psychological horror game, you fight off your nightmares throughout multiple nights to make it to the end of the week, with each night getting more challenging.

name: Sweet Coffee Shop
description: Sweet Coffee Shop - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery. (Updated AI painting style, more fresh and real)

name: They Do Not Die
description: I just think that top down shooters are neat. It's a pretty zen time. A podcast game.

name: Tile To Tile
description: Tile to Tile is an action platformer where the longer you move the faster you go! Your goal is to get the gem at the end of each level as fast as possible!

name: Calypso's Calamity
description: Calypso's Calamity is a ruthless magical rogue-lite platformer where you play as a courageous dog on a quest to rescue her princess, battling enemies, gathering randomized items, and unlocking new abilities in beautifully crafted levels.

name: Reconquista
description: Reconquista is a large-scale battle strategy game with the rules of a deck-building board game with a mood of late Medieval. Carefully refine your strategy, build the best deck, and to win the battles.

name: CrapShoot
description: Kick the crap out of them! Side-scrolling bullet-hell shooter.

name: Frog Box
description: In "Frog Box," help a frog push boxes to form lines of three or more matching ones to clear the board. Explore challenging levels with natural obstacles like logs and streams that affect the movement of the boxes.

name: Countdown
description: Countdown is a short visual novel that tells the story of an ordinary individual's journey through their thoughts and emotions as their life approaches its end. The plot includes critiques and discussions of social issues such as life, family, the workplace, and the healthcare system.

name: Metamorphosis
description: Sin descripción

name: Limbus Company: Season 5 - Oblivion
description:
Season 5: Oblivion is the fifth Season of Limbus Company, released on October 10, 2024.

It consists of the game's seventh Story Chapter (Canto VII: The Dream Ending), centered around the character Don Quixote from the homonymous literary source, the 5th Mirror Dungeon, Line 5 of Refraction Railway, and a number of Identities and E.G.O based on story content.

name: Terroro
description: In this psychological horror experience, you take on the role of a famous TikToker's boyfriend whose seemingly perfect life hides dark secrets. As you explore her home and uncover disturbing clues, you'll realize that nothing is as it seems. This short but intense game is designed to immerse you in a world where reality and fiction intertwine.

name: Damien Crawford's Golf Experience 2024
description: A minimalist golf game that will test your patience.

name: Tiny Pixel Planets
description: Explore the pixel cosmos, jumping from star system to star system. Land on fully procedural planets, and make them your home.

name: PixelQuest: Herb's Adventure
description: A classic, story-driven JRPG with a modern dice-building combat system.

name: Storage Hunter Simulator
description: Bid, win and then sell for profit as you work your way up from the bottom to become the king or queen of the storage auction. Take risks and fight for garages amongst fierce competition as you compete with other bidders to find hidden treasures that will help you turn a profit.

name: Crazy Traffic: City Parking Simulator
description:
Take a ride in a police service vehicle and take your driving skills to the next level, coping with various tasks in difficult conditions. The game offers many levels, each of which is full of dangerous obstacles and difficult tasks. You will have to manoeuvre in a limited space, go around obstacles and accurately park a service vehicle, be it a car, a truck or a heavy van. Assess your skills in practice, because the more difficult the level, the higher your demands on attentiveness and driving technique!

Each car has its own characteristics, which requires you to adapt and develop the right strategy for successful parking. Become the best police driver and earn points for quickly and accurately completing tasks. Go through all the tests and discover the secrets of perfect parking.

name: Big City Driver: Truck Parking Simulator
description:
Your task is to carefully park large trucks. Each task is a new challenge: you will need to manoeuvre through narrow passages, avoid obstacles and accurately park your truck in the designated area. Every situation is unique, and with each level the difficulty increases, forcing you to do everything possible to cope with the task! Parking a large truck is not so easy, especially if it is equipped with a heavy trailer. You will have to show concentration and precision to correctly estimate the distance and turning angle.

Learn to operate heavy equipment and use your skills to avoid penalties for mistakes. In the game you will find different types of trucks and trailers, each of which requires its own approach and driving style. Collect points for fulfilling the conditions and improve your skills, opening new levels and more difficult tasks.

name: Find-o'-Lantern
description: Solve logical riddles in this simple, yet challenging game based on the classic star battle format.

name: Backyard Baseball '97
description: Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997, now updated for modern systems! Build your roster from among the iconic Backyard Kids, aim for those home runs, and various game modes. Relive the magic of this classic baseball game!

name: Highway Legends: Complete DLC Bundle
description: Elevate your Highway Legends experience with the Complete DLC Bundle, featuring three essential expansions: Highway Legends: Road to Riches, which provides 300,000 coins to boost your vehicle upgrades and enhance your racing strategy; Highway Legends: Triple Threat on Street, which unlocks three powerful new cars designed for maximum performance and speed in urban races; and Highway Legends: Desert Mirage Unveiled, which grants access to a stunning new desert map with unique tracks and challenges to conquer. Unlock the full potential of your racing journey with the Complete DLC Bundle.

name: Dinosaur RPG: Dino Survival Simulator Survivor
description: Survive the Past! Unleash prehistoric power evolve, explore, conquer!

name: Stable Stories: Forest and Meadow Ride
description: Saddle up for endless adventures in a magical world of horses, races, and surprises!

name: Rome Goes Rogue
description: Rome Goes Rogue is a chaotic roguelite where anything can happen when you least expect it

name: You Can't Scare Me
description:
Create the ultimate scare-sperience in You Can’t Scare Me - a haunted house game where you can scare or be scared! Team up to scare your friends - or your friends can try to scare you!

Explore 8 creepy levels to find hidden treasures. Set scary traps to frighten your friends - and get points if they scream! Stay invisible and stage creepy encounters all around them - or appear in front of them as a terrifying monster to make them really flip their lid!

Can you freak out your friend enough to reduce them to a shadow of their former selves? Can your friend keep their cool long enough to find the hidden keys and escape the horrible nightmare you’ve crafted for them?

name: Miraibo Go
description:
The mobile monster-themed open world survival game! Get ready to tame various monsters with your friends and explore the world anytime anywhere! Hundreds of classic monsters await you in this exciting adventure!
Explore the world, capture monsters, fight enemies, build a base, and establish a new monster utopia together! More ways to play are waiting for you to discover!

Tame Monsters Hundreds of monsters await you!
More than 100 classic monsters with different skills and elements will accompany you on your adventure! Worried about not being powerful enough? Defeat bosses to improve your team strength!

name: Miss Rosen's Wowtastic! Marching Band
description:
The band is in town, and it’s time for some fun!
Join Miss Rosen, a clockwork majorette escaped from her music box, as she travels the world solving mind-bending puzzles that’ll test your luggage-packing skills to the max!

name: Aimx
description: Free, easy to use & efficient aim trainer. Improve faster!

name: Pin Strike
description: Bowling can be played not only in the hall and only on a straight track. And who says you can't use bombs or springs in the game?

name: PowerWash Simulator: Shrek Special Pack
description:
Playtime is ogre. Get to work cleaning up five fairy tale maps inspired by DreamWorks Animation’s Shrek. It’ll take more than pixie dust to restore these iconic locales to their former lustre, but thankfully, happily ever after is in your hands!

Like onions, dirt has layers. And boy, this particular brew of filth is potent enough to rival even the Fairy Godmother’s strongest concoctions. A sprinkle of soap, a touch of elbow grease and a large dose of ‘DING’s make for the perfect antidote potion! Wash it all down with a swish of high-pressure water and you’ll have these enchanting locations looking as spotless as the Magic Mirror.

name: Frenzies
description: Frenzies is the chaotic PvP shooter for the ultimate show-off, combining nDreams’ precision gunplay with a lucky dip of frantic round types. Make friendships and ruin them amid a hail of neon-soaked gunfire in a winner-takes-all arena showdown.

name: While Mom is Away
description: While Mom's Away is a fast-paced First-Person Shooter where you kill players with toasters, pizza and satellite dishes... And also shoot with chips? What kind of goofy game is this?!

name: Goooool!
description: Have you ever tried playing cards with a bear? But bears don't know how to play cards... That in this incredible game you will feel yourself in the role of a bear who is trying to play cards, but he does not succeed. All he can do is smash everything around and scream Goooool!

name: Gearbits: Raider Expedition
description: Gearbits: Raider expedition is an expansion campaign for Gearbits. The campaign is a side-story, taking place after the end of Gearbits. The expansion features new missions and maps. A new cast of characters and new playable units.

name: Ten Shot
description:
TEN SHOT is an endless arcade game about basic arithmetic.
Dodge and weave through waves of numbers- or punch them together and add to 10.

name: Futariuum's Gate
description: Experience stunning hand-drawn erotic scenes, deep writing and thrilling battles in Futariuum’s Gate, a story-focused visual novel, engaging deck-building card battler and roguelike RPG! Follow Maya, a well-hung futanari demon hunter and total slacker as she brings balance to Earth!

name: I Ching
description: This divination simulator, grounded in the ancient I Ching principles, offers traditional Chinese "Numerical" and "Hexagram Divination" methods. With an AI feature, it answers queries on both ancient metaphysics and modern topics like astrology and MBTI, catering to diverse mystical interests

name: The Fox's Way Home
description: Before you know it, you find yourself in the realm between the hidden world and the real world. Rely on the guidance of the Fox shrine Maiden who lives there, and escape from the otherworld!

name: Famidash
description:
Famidash is a rhythm-based, action platformer that will test every limit of your patience. There are no checkpoints – every time you die, you must try the level over from the start!

Don’t worry though! – There is a practice mode! Simply pause the game, hit B and you’ll set a checkpoint to restart at so you can master any parts of a level.

Avoid distractions as the game switches your playmode from a jumping cube to a flying ship to a hopping UFO to a rolling ball and more!

name: Unplagued
description: Play as plague doctors with your friends in this multiplayer co-op medieval horror! Purge the plague. Create the cure. Escape the mutated creatures. Make the queen proud.

name: Keepers of Ancient Lands
description: ou are one of the defenders of ancient lands. In this game, you have to destroy crowds of enemies with the help of your faithful warriors.

name: DOOM 64: Unseen Evil
description: Doom 64: Unseen Evil (or Unseen Evil for short) is a mod for GZDoom that transplants the Doom 64 atmosphere into Doom and Doom II. In addition to replacing various monsters and items with their Doom 64 counterparts, Unseen Evil also uses ZScript to transform existing Doom levels into Doom 64-style locations.

name: Măgurele Mystery 2
description: After Captain Burcea's discovery from the previous game, the secret services started experimenting with what they found, but everything goes out of control and a virus is created by mistake... or was it? Peoples zombie-like starts wandering around and mutated creatures start killing.

name: Beware the Depths
description: Get in. Get Loot. Get out. Countless misguided souls have delved into the unknown Depths. Some seek riches, others, long-lost arcane secrets, and for a few: heroic glory for the sake of mankind. No matter what it is that you seek - if you want to stay alive, always remember to Beware the Depths.

name: XVTM
description: The abyss awaits. Descend into a minimalist visual novel about a girl in the future, and guide her through branching conversations, microgames, and explorable locations. Make friends with criminals, drink too much at dinner, or relax in a spa. Whatever happens, it was your choice.

name: Vespera
description: Vespera is an online co-op game. Play as relic hunters, solving enigmatic mysteries and escaping a terrifying monster. Will you dare to face the darkness to find the cursed relics?

name: Zodiac Revenger
description: Zodiac Revenger is a 2D action platformer. Took place post the Zodiac race, the 12 winners have been reward with great mystical power. They used it to spread chaos throught the peaceful land. Follow the Cat on a quest to dethrone the terror rulers, and get his own revenge on the Zodiac leader.

name: Elements: Path of the Wizard
description: A card game where you will be responsible for the fate of an entire kingdom. Try on the role of a wise court magician, who is able to prevent a catastrophe with just a wave of his hand. At your disposal will be valuable magic items and all the existing elements.

name: Diceomancer
description: Diceomancer is a roguelike deck-building game. Despite aspiring to live a peaceful life, fate forced you to embark on an adventure. Make the most of your deck and dice in a world filled with swords, magic, and guns, all to restore the tranquility you once knew!

name: Simulakros
description:
Fight the evil CORP from the inside. Confront deadly robots in this fast-paced third person shooter with rogue-lite elements.

Defy the CORP by using their own creation against them, the Simulakros Unit, equipped with advanced weapons and abilities to wreak havoc to their facilities.

Inside the CORP facilities you will discover powerful chips that you can equip to permanently improve your ability to control Simulakros Units. Each run will grant you experience, allowing you to equip more and more!

name: Soul Drifter
description: Soar into a gravity-defying parkour adventure. Run, jump, and glide through surreal landscapes and deadly factories on a mission to liberate captive souls.

name: Spear Song
description: Add to the vishlist now! Spear Song is a turn-based tactic inspired by Slavic folklore, where turn-based tactics are combined with juicy and memorable graphics. Take the leadership of a small squad into your own hands and crush the most ferocious hordes of evil spirits and their mighty leaders!

name: Stampede Racing Royale
description: Welcome to the wildest kart racing event ever devised, where 60 players go bumper-to-bumper on outrageous circuits filled with power-ups. Avoid elimination and fight your way to the front of the herd in the scramble to be crowned champion!

name: Guild Saga: Vanished Worlds
description: As a newcomer to the Heroes Guild, you were inexplicably chosen for a mission of grave importance, much to the chagrin of your seniors. Unravel the mystery as you make your way towards the Andra, an unchartered continent in the west brimming with danger and opportunity.

name: Last Time I Saw You
description:
Last Time I Saw You is a coming-of-age narrative adventure about first loves and acceptance. An uplifting story, rich with complex characters, set in a vibrantly imagined vision of late 80s Japan.

Join Ayumi on an exciting tale of self-discovery in which he'll face his first tentative steps into adulthood and confront the terrible curse that has fallen upon his hometown.

name: Tipston Salvage
description: Junkyard logistics couch co-op game that focuses on teamwork and communication. Store, crush and ship processed scrap as fast as possible, while trying to synchronize with your teammates.

name: Decline's Drops
description: Grab your punching gloves, put your clogs on and smash your way in the world of Decline's Drops, a fully hand-drawn platform-brawler full of weird frogs, bizarre chickens and odd hydras! Avenge your destroyed garden and defeat the 6 heads of the Eternal Corp.! If you can, that is.

name: Alice's Lullaby
description: Embark on a surreal, psychedelic adventure to travel back and forth through time and rescue young Alice, helping her escape the uncanny, macabre and treacherous world of Styx. Unravel the metaphysical mystery of the grandchild cult and find out why they call you the monster!

name: Amber Isle
description: Welcome to Amber Isle - a quaint, friendly village of prehistoric residents who are in need of a new shopkeep... That’s you! Craft and sell items, upgrade your shop, befriend your Paleofolk neighbours and customise the island to bring the village back to life and welcome even more prehistoric pals!

name: Mr. T-Shirt
description: Help Mr. T-Shirt in a world of paper and doodles. Collect the key and move on to the next level, facing unique challenges in every stage!

name: Sprout Valley Big Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Holidays: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Holidays: Postcard Stickers Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Holidays: Postcard Stickers Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Holidays: Postcard Stickers Pack 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Microbial Sector
description:
Microbial Sector is a short, experimental first-person horror game

It's your first day as a lifeform researcher, and while you don’t know much about the job, you're desperate for the paycheck. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Dark Tank
description: Multiplayer online catapult game in the style of Warcraft. The game's combat scenarios are rich and varied, and players can use terrain and power-ups to fight and use a variety of unique weapons and skills to defeat their opponents.

name: Stray Memoria
description: A contemporary juvenile mystery about young boys and girls who grow up confused and troubled, and adults who harbor secrets.

name: Creature Packets
description:
Creature Packets is a game about cooking tiny creatures. Using a microwave, you can bring creatures from packets to life. Use blender to explore new substance packages to cook even more creatures.

The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 56 on the theme "tiny creatures".

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Jungle Getaway
description: The 13th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings a new day-night cycle to The Lion King Realm, the new characters The Night Show Star Path and the return of the Halloween seasonal event Trick or Treat.

name: Em Busca dos Tesouros
description:
In command of the adventurer H. Unter Kid, the player must explore the terrible T. Nebrous Land in search of incredible treasures, but not before facing unique and hostile creatures, such as the Crazy Scorpion and the Big Head Kannibal!

Pitfall! heavily inspired this game, initially released for the ZX81 line of computers, but is now available on the Atari 2600!

name: Hack 0 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tsugunohi: Supernatural Supermarket
description: The setting is a supermarket after closing hours!

name: Arcade Archives: Power Spikes
description: The long-awaited second instalment of "Super Volleyball" with interesting competitive play! !

name: Anime Dance-Off: Ghost Party
description: Step into a universe where music and movement collide in a spectacular party experience for seasoned rhythm gamers and newcomers.

name: Balls Crush Simulator
description: The only simulator where you can crush balls with fun and pleasure!

name: Bad Parenting 1: Mr. Red Face
description: Mr. Red Face, a fictional character created by adults to teach their children, suddenly becomes real..

name: Ostrich Run
description: Ostrich Run is a game where you guide a horde of ostriches out of a lab. Take every ostrich you can and avoid the multiple hazards on your way out. The ostriches will help you break harder windows and rescue more ostriches. Make sure to save them all!

name: Tankbot Battle
description: A fast paced, action packed, roguelite game with tanks! Blast your way through procedurally generated levels, and build overpowered combinations of upgrades! Face off against a variety of different enemies and epic bosses.

name: Daburali
description: ”Double Lariat” Action GAME Blow away various enemies Wrench-chan's show starts now!

name: AlongLong Road
description: Along long road is a road simulation game what you can feel the beautiful scenery and peaceful atmosphere. Players can walk the forest road , see a variety of animals, and enjoy hike at their own pace. If you empty your mind and move forward patiently, you can see the end of even the longest road.

name: Order9
description: About this game ORDER9 is an ‘auto-battle card game' in which players use cards to turn the situation upside down in order to make their chosen character win in the arena.

name: The Gate
description: The Gate is an interactive science fiction graphic novel. At various points in the story, you will be asked to make a choice, these choices will take you down different paths in the story. Your objective as you guide the story is to return back to earth. The game features 3 possible story endings.

name: PopSlinger vol. 2: Loveless
description: Return to the PopSlinger universe in this coffee-fueled sequel! Join an elite agent and a digital idol on a mission to rescue a lost heroine in a world full of vibrant chaos. Face new enemies, uncover the mysteries of the Purple District, and groove to a freshly brewed beat!

name: Castlevania Collections Bundle
description: [Title lineup] ・Castlevania Dominus Collection ・Castlevania Advance Collection ・Castlevania Anniversary Collection ■Castlevania Dominus Collection In addition to the three action adventure games from the Castlevania series, Haunted Castle R

name: Contra x Castlevania Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Green Day: Dookie - Welcome to Paradise
description: A fully playable, demastered version of “Welcome To Paradise” on Game Boy made in collaboration with the band Green Day and the Californian art studio BRAIN, which will immerse you in the world of a small apartment in Oakland, California. Search out the record to play the full 8-bit rendition of your favorite song. Listen till your thumbs are sore then play again.

name: Gengu Survival
description: Survive on an open-world island with unlockable abilities that help you on your journey in Gengu Survival. Craft new items as you level up and build your own base wherever you want. But be aware, there is something strange on this island...

name: Proportions
description: Proportions is an indie asymmetrical game where players take on the roles of either a giant or minis. The giant’s objective is to catch the minis, who must use their agility and cunning to evade capture. Designed with streamers in mind, the game features proximity chat to enhance the immersive experience and foster dynamic interactions.

name: Stacy Sharp and the Night Of Too Many Monsters
description: Survive waves of enemies, buy permanent upgrades, befriend colorful characters, die and do it all over again.

name: Crown & Capital
description: As the new ruler of a kingdom recovering from fiscal ruin, your job is to keep the torches lit and replenish the treasury. Learn to manage your finances by budgeting for your needs, wants, and savings to make your people thrive and your neighbors respect the legacy of the kingdom you will build!

name: Dungeon Antiqua
description: Dungeon Antiqua is a simple RPG inspired by the Wizardry and Final Fantasy games of the 1980s and 1990s, in which players traverse dungeons by repeatedly exploring and developing their characters.

name: Cave Crawler 2
description: Cave Crawler 2 is a retro-inspired 2D side-scroller. Escape a series of winding caves full of strange creatures and treacherous platforming challenges.

name: My Happy Village in the Kingdom
description: Welcome to your village in the kingdom, manage resources, complete tasks and events in real-time, get gold and materials from dungeons, win a new castle, steal items from magic characters, increase affinity and work on your popularity. And more in the Medieval Clicker. The magic dragon awaits you.

name: GhostlyRyokan
description:
An abandoned inn where lost souls wander, your decision will determine its outcome. The truth about the horror and tragedy hidden in an abandoned ryokan. You step into an abandoned ryokan where ghosts wander about, and you will discover the mystery of a terrible tragedy that occurred in the past. The ghost of a maid who once worked there still wanders the inn and drags visitors into the depths of fear.

Players will be forced to make the ultimate choice: to search through the horror-filled inn and collect hidden clues, or to release the spirit or release the grudge. Will you be able to escape the inn safely?

name: The Planet Crafter: Planet Humble
description:
Experience a fresh start as a Planet Crafter on the brand new world of Planet Humble!
Alone or with friends, scout this unknown land, discover its story, novelties and secrets and accomplish once again the task to terraform an entire world!

name: Genshin Impact: The Rainbow Destined to Burn
description:
Version 5.1 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Xilonen
• New main story quests: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Acts III & IV
• New Tribal Chronicles quest: Children of Echoes - Act III
• New main event: Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Beatmania IIDX 32 Pinky Crush
description:
“beatmania IIDX 32 Pinky Crush” is a combination of “Pink”, a vivid and pure image color, and “Crush”, a radical image typical of IIDX.

Until now, there has been a version that emphasizes the concept of HAPPY and EUPHORIC image along with the trend of dance music, but in this concept, the exaltation of the image that stands out even more, and players can participate in one large music festival through beatmania IIDX. We are sending you images that allow you to experience a sense of elation.

We asked the composers who participated this time to create bright and exciting images overall, and requested them to be produced in various forms by incorporating the styles that each individual is good at.
While putting an easy-to-understand concept at the forefront, we are compiling music pieces that image various types of high tension, such as the vitality of a leap, anticipation of an upcoming show, the feeling of a powerful rush, etc. . (Because I think there are times when you don't feel that way, I'm also preparing cool, "crush" songs that are typical of IIDX!)

In addition, this time, we have lined up a number of popular songs that match the concept of beatmania IIDX and are fun to listen to and play.

Then feel the tension of beatmania IIDX 32 Pinky Crush.

name: Kaihou Kuukan: Over Field
description: Kaihou Kuukan: Over Field is an upcoming RPG game for iOS, Android, and PC, scheduled for release in 2024. It is currently in Early Access.

name: Glyphica: Typing Survival
description: Glyphica is a typing-roguelike that blends survival and strategy. Type to shoot. Test your keyboard mastery, unlock powerful upgrades, and craft overpowered builds to destroy hordes of enemies.

name: Hidden in my Paradise
description: Hide objects, decorate, and replicate cool snaps in this cozy hidden-object game where you can create little paradises!

name: Whimel Academy
description: Whimel is a cozy academia time-management dating simulation game set in a magic school. Study magic, develop hobbies and fall in love in this wholesome and enchanting place.

name: The Blogger
description: The Blogger is a third-person horror game focused on story, exploration, and solving simple puzzles to progress through a terrifying atmosphere. Take control of our protagonist, a young photographer for a horror blog.

name: Clarity: The Seven Demons of Vanguardia
description: Clarity is a 2D side scrolling platforming adventure. Choose to face seven demons and acquire their demon sword and demon magic. Each sword and spell, has an elemental strength against a corresponding demon.

name: Plague: London 1665
description: Plague: London 1665 is an RPG with pixel art graphics set in 1665's during the Bubonic Plague outbreak in overcrowded and polluted London. As a body collector, graveyard keeper, and family provider, avoid the disease while clearing the streets. Will you survive the outbreak or become another victim?

name: Sky Oceans: Wings for Hire
description: Sky Oceans: Wings For Hire is a homage to JRPG classics like Skies of Arcadia. Set in the open skies, experience adrenaline-filled turn-based dogfights as you take the role of captain and unite a party of rag-tag sky pirates setting upon an unforgettable, touching journey.

name: Garage Flipper
description: Garage Flipper is a game where you get to be a builder and renovator of garages and car repair shops. Your task is to complete jobs and build up your empire by buying and restoring old facilities. Grab your hammer, your mortar, and get to work!

name: Gost of Time
description: 42 and more ways of using your own dead body in time travel. GOST of Time is an absurdist top-down action and puzzle game with time-traveling mechanics.

name: Duck Paradox
description: Shoot bouncing bullets to kill corrupted versions of your Pet Duck. Slow down time to maneuver in a flashy way as you try to solve puzzles under pressure and chain explosions to rescue the original version of your Pet Duck!

name: Heavy Cargo: The Truck Simulator
description: Transport oversized cargo in a variety of missions across a 175km² open world. Drive customisable, highly detailed trucks through dynamic weather and day and night. The official cooperation with Gruber Logistics allows you to get behind the wheel of real-life heavy cargo transports.

name: Shady Knight
description: Shady Knight is a first-person skill-driven melee action game centered around swift swordplay, acrobatic archery, and fluid platforming that seamlessly blends combat and parkour skills into a stylish dance of death full of creative chaos.

name: Craftimals: Build to the Sun
description: A Xbox live indie game that has you using blocks to reach the sun.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Italian Autumn
description: Reinforce your collection with an exclusive Italian Premium destroyer!

name: Enlisted: "Guerrilla Warfare" Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

- PPS-43 Squad
- MP 40 Squad

name: Star Wars: Hunters - Frosty Nerf Herder Cosmetic Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Unplayable
description: UNPLAYABLE is a funny/artsy compilation of absurd video games, each in a specific genre: beat'em up, puzzle game and platformer. An art project with meaning.

name: Madness on Display
description: Venture into the world of chilling psychological horror, where the line between reality and nightmare is thinner than a spider's web. Grandview is not just a game, it is a test for your nerves and mind.

name: Loop
description: Loop is a visual novel set in a dark Irish Forest. Deirdre is set to find her husband who was sworn to become the Forest King. But it’s not easy for a human to walk in the magical realm. What will Deirdre learn about this other world? What will she find out about herself?

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Essentials Pack
description: Get the full Kingdom Two Crowns experience with this bundle, which includes all additional campaign expansions for the game.

name: Star Wars: Hunters - Gorax Fury Cosmetic Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft: James Web Space Telescope
description: Explore NASA’s groundbreaking work in a dynamic and interactive new way. Engage with exciting, hands-on tutorials that explore the wonders of the James Webb Space Telescope. Learn about star formation, planet characteristics, and Galaxy structures then dive into a Creative Build Challenge to create your own solar system

name: 1x111
description: "1x111" (One times one-one-one) throws you into a thrilling 1-minute frenzy of 5 random 1-button minigames, selected from 111 unique challenges.

name: Tango
description:
Harmonize the grid.

The goal of the puzzle is to fill the grid with sun and moon icons. No more than 2 of either symbol may be next to each other. Each row and column must contain the same number of symbols. Cells separated by an = sign must be of the same type, while cells separated by an X sign must be of the opposite type.

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Olympus Edition
description: In addition to Kingdom Two Crowns, this edition includes Call of Olympus, the latest major expansion set in ancient Greece!

name: Kingdom Coronation Collection
description: This is the ultimate Kingdom collection, containing the following entries in the award-winning strategy series: Kingdom New Lands, Kingdom Two Crowns, Kingdom Two Crowns: Norse Lands, Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus, and Kingdom Eighties.

name: Deads On The Road: Shoot Zombie Hunting 2024
description:
Survive the zombie apocalypse in "Deads on the Road"!
Scavenge for supplies, battle hordes of the undead, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: Traveller's Hymn
description: Traveller's Hymn is a top-down, grid-based, open-world adventure game. Explore a vast land, battle monsters, collect loot, help locals and cook hearty meals while unraveling the mystery behind the land's curse.

name: A Dino's Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: EA Sports WRC 24
description: Elevate your rally experience with the WRC 2024 Season Expansion Bundle! Discover thrilling new locations, Tet Rally Latvia and the Orlen 80th Rally Poland. Drive the latest high-performance vehicles including the Ford Fiesta Rally3 Evo and Toyota GR Yaris Rally1 HYBRID '24. Customize your rally cars with more than 50 new liveries and compete against 52 official crews. Brace yourself to embark on your continued rally journey.

name: Echo: The Oracle's Scroll
description: Explore a fading world and best its many challenges. As an adventurous child, you'll embark on a quest to deliver a scroll from Bottomrock up to The Archives. Journey through magma lakes and overgrown caverns as you venture through The Kingdoms Three!

name: Fortress
description: Fortress is an exploration game with different enemy and weapon types, puzzles, secrets, unique dialogue, and more. There are 57 different rooms in the game for you to explore. Your character starts with no weapons or items and you progress through the game by finding items, solving puzzles, and interacting with NPCs. The game uses the D-pad the vast majority of the time as you navigate a large fortress filled with monsters, people, stories, and traps. The game utilizes the crank for one of the puzzles. You receive scores at the end of the game based on how many treasures you collect, how many gems you find, and how many times you die in the game. The main objective of the game is to escape the fortress! There is no save functionality, but you can lock your Playdate and start where you left off later on. An average playthrough takes about 30 minutes. It takes most players more than one playthrough to achieve the top rank in each category.

name: Sapphire City Part 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Bender 2: Bend Harder
description:
Step into the circuits of a robot with an unusual job: bending bars to precise angles.

Your hydraulic hands are itching to twist metal as you stand at the first workstation. A single button controls the bending, and thicker bars bend slower than thinner bars. Let go of the controls when the bar reaches the target angle. Success/retry/fail?

name: Halo Infinite: Operation Haloween
description:
It’s that time of year again where there’s a chill in the air, the wind howls and bites as the night comes early, a thin mist settles over the fields, and humanity marches on—their minds and bodies fueled by pumpkin spice lattes... With this change of the seasons, it is also time for a new Halo Infinite Operation. Welcome to Haloween!

Get yourselves in the Haloween mindset with the Survive the Undead playlist. Grab your friends, gear up, and jump into a unique twist on Halo Infinite’s Firefight experience as you stand your ground against endless waves of enemies that have been banished from their graves.

Celebrate Haloween with a free new Operation Pass, consisting of 20 tiers and featuring the Spartanstein armor set. This free cosmetic Halloween-themed "operation pass" launched aside this update and ran from October 8, 2024 to November 5, 2024. It was made available in perpetuity to those who purchased the pass.

name: Anomaly Corridor
description: Anomaly Corridor is a horror-themed walking simulator where the player memorizes a corridor in a spaceship during Section 0 and proceeds through the airlocks into new sections leading to an escape pod. Creatures and other weird phenomena haunt the hallway with anomalies that you must look for with the help of your flashlight to discover any anomalies that have changed the corridor. If an anomaly has been spotted, you must return to the airlock you came from to progress to the next section. Successfully make it to section 10 to board the last escape pod to survive.

name: Their Navy Is Their Doom
description: Command an advanced submarine in a heart-pounding horror experience as you hunt the last remnants of a defeated enemy beneath the Mariana Trench. Navigate, survive, and uncover terrifying oceanic secrets in this immersive underwater warfare game.

name: Paper Puzzle
description: Place all the pieces into the grid, and as long as they don't overlap, you can clear the level. Simple rules but a real challenge. Want to give it a try?

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 1
description: Fikrul the Fanatic has re-emerged, possessing a powerful Echo and an army of undead Scorn at his command. Guardians will become Slayer Barons and upgrade their abilities with powerful tonics to confront the Scorn’s corrupted ether.

name: Ancestral
description: Play as Miguel, a member of a Masonic fraternity, as you investigate the disappearance of your brothers in a mysterious residence. Uncover the secrets brought from Egypt, deal with supernatural forces and interdimensional horrors. Discover what really happened and face the unknown.

name: Virulent Vessels: The Legend of Gobbledygunk
description: Sin descripción

name: Prison Survival: Inmate Life Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Quiet House Massacre
description: Can you reveal the dark secrets hidden in a familiar old, quiet house? The truth awaits revelation!

name: LEGO Harry Potter Collection
description: The LEGO Harry Potter: Collection brings LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 and LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7 together in one game, now remastered with enhanced graphics.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Hatred Rising
description:
Mephisto’s hatred has spread far and wide, creating nightmarish monstrosities to roam the land and reinstilling a sense of dread in the hearts of Sanctuary’s denizens. No one and nowhere is safe from the Lord of Hatred’s maddening influence, not even you.

Stand against encroaching hatred with fearsome new power in Diablo’s latest major update. Experience updated progression systems, more levels, gain all-new skills, discover new items, grow your glyphs to a new legendary level, and test your mettle in new difficulty levels that reward the most daring. Seek out and take down the Realmwalkers and explore the Seething Realms. Unite with allies via Party Finder and save Sanctuary from the relentless tide of Mephisto’s corruption.

name: SkyBrew: Entropic Strategist
description: Experience entrepreneurship in a floating cloud cafe. Manage your flying cafe, customize construction, train staff, handle random events, and uncover the secrets of the commercial empire, growing from a small shop to the sky's brightest star.

name: Spin Hero
description: Spin Hero is a roguelike deckbuilder, where you spin the reels to decide your fate. Collect powerful symbols for your inventory, adapt and evolve your strategy, learning from defeats to unlock new possibilities and synergies.

name: Disc Frenzy
description: Welcome to Disc Frenzy, a virtual reality disc golf adventure that takes you to the charming alien planet of Udarvia.

name: Dirge For The Zone
description: Dirge For the Zone/D4Z is a top-down shooter with role-playing and base-building elements. Build your base, protect your people and send them to explore the Zone.

name: Dead Season
description: Guide a group of unprepared strangers in their struggle to survive a zombie apocalypse, in Dead Season, a turn-based tactics game. Strategize to endure against relentless undead hordes, but beware, noise attracts more danger. Can you escape the outbreak's grip?

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus
description: Explore islands of ancient legends and mythos, seek the favors of the gods to challenge and defend against Greed of epic scales in this major expansion - Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus.

name: Hollow: Cook Off
description: Stylish and Deadly shooterHollow: Cook Off is the mix of sidescroll shooter and stylish action.You are the quiet but skillful agent, Hollow. And you're going to infiltrate a mysterious factory.Shot, Cut, Float and make your combination.Fight quickly and glamorously but coolly.

name: Oh Baby! Kart
description: Kart Racing. Ultimate abilities. Over 100+ Karts. 100+ Challenges. Unique racing modes including Race Royale and Grand Prix Duo.

name: Diablo IV: Vessel of Hatred
description:
The battle against Hatred has only just begun.
Journey into the new region of Nahantu in search of Neyrelle, who is both suffering the fate of her choice to imprison the Prime Evil Mephisto, and seeking a means to destroy him.
Become the apex predator of the jungle as the all-new Spiritborn class. Recruit Mercenaries to aid you in combat, fight together in a new PvE co-op activity, & more.

name: Tower of Dreams
description: Climb your way to the top of the tower in this vertical platforming roguelike! Bound off walls, discover fantastical items, and make use of Dream Knight's sword to bounce off of obstacles!

name: Takoyaki Surprise
description: Journey to Restaurant Island to save the Octopus Princess from being cooked on live TV by the evil celebrity chef, Shefu, in this thrilling point-and-click action game!

name: Pro Philosopher 2: Governments & Grievances
description: Dive headfirst into everyone's favorite topic: politics! Engage famous philosophers of all stripes, challenge their ideas, and change the world— or just tell everyone they smell terrible. NONSENSE!

name: Engine Evolution 2023
description: Your favorite racing MMO is back - this time with amazing tracks, more entertaining physics, and much more! Enjoy multiplayer racing action more intense than ever before!

name: Gum Ball Run
description: Gum Ball Run is a free to play fast paced 3D platformer with online multiplayer where Gum Balls race against each other through procedurally generated obstacle courses to become the #1 Gum Ball in the Gummieverse!

name: Silent Hill 2
description: Investigating a letter from his late wife, James returns to where they made so many memories - Silent Hill. What he finds is a ghost town, prowled by disturbing monsters and cloaked in deep fog. Confront the monsters, solve puzzles, and search for traces of your wife in this remake of Silent Hill 2.

name: Off The Grid
description:
Welcome to Off The Grid, the heart-pounding Extraction Royale where survival is just the beginning. Dive into a dark, cyberpunk world crafted by visionary director Neill Blomkamp (District 9) and prepare to augment, adapt, and dominate like never before!

Gear up with custom cyberlimbs and hundreds of weapon combos, modifying your body and arsenal mid-fight. Extract high-value loot, outsmart your enemies, and transform into a force of destruction. You’re not just fighting to survive—you’re fighting to be the last one standing.

name: Townframe
description: A relaxing puzzle game where you recreate towns from people's memories. These people will give you written puzzles and to solve them you'll be able to either modify the buildings or use different tools, such as one that makes wind, and many others. Each puzzle will surprise you in a different way.

name: Extra Coin
description: Extra Coin is a narrative side-scrolling thriller game mixing sports, set in a virtual social network called The Arcade, where the entire population has devoted their lives. It's a hard story about revenge, failure, resistance, and hiding behind appearances.

name: Undisputed
description: Become Undisputed in the most authentic boxing game to date! Featuring true-to-life visuals, bone-jarring action, and more licensed boxers than ever before, Undisputed gives you unprecedented control to master every inch of the ring.

name: Trivia Tricks
description: Trivia Tricks is a trivia party game played online and locally with up to 8 players!

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Easyland 2
description: A continuation of the Easyland project, dedicated to beginner kaizo players. Short levels with good intensity.

name: Crafter
description:
Welcome to the world of crafting and adventure!

In Crafter, you step into the shoes of a skilled medieval artisan. Collect materials, master your crafting techniques, and run your own shop in this hybrid casual mobile game with idle and RPG elements. Whether you’re crafting powerful weapons, enchanting mystical artifacts, or managing your customers’ satisfaction, your journey as an artisan is packed with fun and strategy.

name: Hentai World: Ultra Definitive
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero!: Ultimate Upgrade Pack
description:
The DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Ultimate Upgrade Pack includes the following items:
• Goku (Super) Costume with Power Pole
• Emote Voice Set
• 2 player card backgrounds
• 1 customization item that increases a character's fighting ability

name: Orion Drift
description: You and your fellow robots were once Earth's premier athletes. Now forge a destiny among the stars together!

name: 808: Firetower12
description: You are Max. A 17 year old that has just graduated from school. Your mother want's you to get a job. You search endlessely but the luck just isn't on your side. Until one day. You have been accepted as a Fire lookout. A week later, you head out.

name: Neurokino Retrograde
description: A melancholic/esoteric sci-fi visual novel; reconnect with a being that (you hope...?) might be your missing/returned ex-girlfriend.

name: Orange Roulette
description: Trapped in a prison hell, a desperate orange will play a deadly game in the hopes of getting shipped to safer markets. Can he survive what his captors have freshly squeezed for him?

name: Hyper Rider
description: Sin descripción

name: Stick Up
description: Sin descripción

name: Cinderella: Princess of the Magic Kingdom
description: After becoming queen, Cinderella enjoys a life of peace and prosperity with her husband and friends. This tranquillity is threatened when a dark force breaks into her life.

name: Survival After War
description: Survive in harsh conditions. Help other survivors. Rebuild the city after the war.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Deluxe Edition
description:
Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Learn and master an incredible roster of playable characters, each with signature abilities, transformations, and techniques. Unleash the fighting spirit within you and take the fight to arenas that crumble and react to your power as the battle rages on.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

• Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO
• Season Pass - 3 Packs including Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero and Dragon Ball Daima content that contains more than 20 playable characters
• Season Pass Bonus - Summon Shenron and 3 Days Early Access to the 3 DLC Packs

name: Galacard Platinum
description: Welcome to the Platinum edition of the Planetary Galacard Tournament! In this competition, you’ll be able to play against Galacard aficionados from every corner of Planet Ack, and, above all, have fun!

name: Bakudan Baku-tan
description: A simple caravan shooter with tiny creatures. A game focused on scoring points while dodging the hell of bullets and defeating enemies.

name: Nnnnnight
description: Morning has ended, and night has begun. Somewhere, many people are spending their respective nights—walking their dogs, studying in their rooms, striving at work... You observe the night until "she" becomes "morning". "NNNNNIGHT" is an adventure game themed around night.

name: Viking Fish
description: An idle-fishing game played at the bottom of your screen, letting you multitask effortlessly. Progress by unlocking Vikings and upgrading their gear to fish for better loot, faster.

name: 7 Minutes in Hell
description: 7 Minutes in Hell is an intense, co-operative horror game, where 1-4 contestants must face high-stakes challenges! In this thrilling gameshow experience, work together to hunt for loot and internet fame, while escaping from monsters, traps, and obstacles, before your 7 minutes are up!

name: Vampyre Crusade
description:
This is a story where you play as a holy knight and a Nun from a fictional religious order of knights. You both were requested to come to this castle in Romania for a royal event, which turned into a crusade of vampires from another dimension. You must rescue all the royal family from different type of blood-eaters like: Skeletons, Ghouls, Large bats, lesser vampires, Hellhounds, Werewolfs, Wraiths, Incubus, Succubus, Bi-Incubus Devils, Greater vampire and their cult of human followers.

It is a Souls-Like experience but with melee weapons and guns and crafting of healing items and crossbow bolts.

name: Disney Pixel RPG
description: Crossover Disney mobile RPG, with simple controls and a pixel/retro art style.

name: Profiteer
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in Profiteer, a turn-based strategy game where you build and expand your business empire. Manage resources, outsmart your rivals, and experience dynamic worlds with co-op gameplay.

name: Greengrocer's
description: Greengrocer's is a clicker game where you click vegetables! In Greengrocer's, you click vegetables to gain even more vegetables! For every 3 clicks, you get a new vegetable! You will also receive extra vegetables for the time you spend managing your Greengrocer's.

name: Proxy Adventure: Small Test
description: Control the proxy to battle enemies, upgrade skills and stats, and find new weapons in this side-scrolling fantasy adventure game.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Ultimate Edition
description:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Learn and master an incredible roster of playable characters, each with signature abilities, transformations, and techniques. Unleash the fighting spirit within you and take the fight to arenas that crumble and react to your power as the battle rages on.
The Ultimate Edition includes:

DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO base game disc
Collectible lenticular card with Ultimate Edition upgrade pack voucher
Season Pass - 3 Packs including Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO and Dragon Ball DAIMA content that contains more than 20 playable characters.
Season Pass Bonus - Summon Shenron and 3 Days Early Access to the 3 DLC Packs
3 Days Early Access
Ultimate Upgrade Pack - including the following in-game items:
Goku (Super) Costume with Power Pole
Emote Voice Set
2 player card backgrounds
1 customization item that increases a character's fighting ability
Ultimate Edition Bonus - Summon Super Shenron

name: Global Farmer
description: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! Want to experience a rich strawberry harvest in the French countryside? Or challenge the hot sun in South America? The choice is yours!

name: Mach Wing
description: In a mythological world dominated by combat ships known as MachWing, Ignis, a brave pilot, will play a significant role. A JRPG-style story unfolds, where battles take on a "Shoot em up" style with RPG and strategy elements. Experience this unusual blend!

name: Creepy Creepy Love
description: Rose Akuma is in love with her childhood friend, Samon Ribasa. Rosa loves him so much that she is ready to defend her love with her fists, challenging all her rivals to a brutal duel.

name: Putrika 1st.Cut: The Reason She Must Perish
description: "Even though I knew this love was forbidden..." While the tragedy is being told, the girl's true love is revealed! Enjoy this crazy pure love drama with beautiful visuals and cute characters!

name: Stellar Orphans
description: Indie roguelite deckbuilder in space

name: The house of the missing hands
description: A first person flat/VR survival horror game where you have to escape the dark farm where you are being kept against your will after finding out the package you were delivering contained a human hand. Use stealth to avoid The hand collector while unraveling the reason he collects hands.

name: SherloCat Holmes Nonogram
description: SherloCat Holmes combines Picross with a captivating plot. With the charming detective cat, face various nonograms. Enjoy captivating music and design as you unravel mysteries and encounter Sherlock Holmes.

name: Into the Backrooms: Last Tape
description: "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" transports players into a dark and eerie world of the Backrooms. Immerse yourself in an atmospheric horror experience, explore procedurally generated labyrinths, and uncover the secrets lurking in the dark corners.

name: Scarmonde
description: 8-Bit Styled dungeon-crawler wherein you assemble a party from 12 Classes to brave The Depths in search of the Dragon God's Sacred Treasures!

name: Felix the Cat: Classic Edition
description:
A special edition of the Felix the Cat bundle. It includes:
- Physical Copy of Felix the Cat with Reversible Cover
- Felix the Cat Classic Box
- Felix the Cat Original Game Soundtrack (Single Disc)
- 12" x 16" Poster

name: Kind Words 2
description: A game about being kind to real people. Send nice letters from your cozy room, go outside and say hi to your neighbors, swap recommendations, dress up for the poetry slam and add your dreams to a sky full of wishes. Join a community of real people with their hearts on their sleeves.

name: Cosmorists
description: Explore, and exploit your surroundings to advance! Unlock crafting recipes in a tech tree via research, and crafting science. Explore the surface, or deep in the caves, and protecting yourself against the elements in dangerous areas, or relaxing in safe areas!

name: Year Unknown
description: A story-based exploration game about the very far future, where humanity has conquered the universe. With the help of two Artificial Intelligences, explore the conquered universe and uncover your purpose in it.

name: Kiss Me
description: Kiss Me is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Anima Flux
description: Anima Flux is a couch co-op metroidvania with two genetically enhanced soldiers, special agents of a theocratic dictatorial regime. Fight your way through swarms of mutants through a desolate, dystopian space city and save humanity's last stronghold, if, of course, anyone is still alive

name: Dungeons and Raids
description: Dungeons and Raids is a gacha game where you will collect heroes and make them fight in the dungeons...

name: Animal Trainer Simulator
description: Become a real-life animal trainer! Manage and develop your animal training center, create a safe and happy place for them! Train different types of animals, and give them a lot of attention and they will surely become calmer and more cooperative with their owners.

name: Phoenix Springs
description: Lose yourself in the mystery of "Phoenix Springs", a modern point-and-click set in a striking neo-noir world. It begins with an investigation: find your brother Leo. You already know where it ends.

name: Beloved Rapture
description: Beloved Rapture is an indie jRPG inspired by the classics. Explore beautiful landscapes, fight in turn-based battles, and uncover many secrets. This mid-length adventure balances both an intimate coming of age story, and larger threats looming over the troubled kingdom.

name: NecroFarm
description: NecroFarm is a top-down minion defense game that's part farming and part tower defense. Grow crops and use necromancy to raise them as your unholy minions! Defend your farm from waves of monsters and grow your army size as you gain new crops and minions.

name: Fall of Kings
description: Fall of Kings is the new representative of roguelike strategy deck building games. In a medieval Europe on the brink of chaos, play as a mighty king and use intrigue or force to triumph over your opponents.

name: Arches
description: In this visual novel, boyfriends Cameron and Devon investigate the supposedly haunted ghost town of Echo in search of an explanation of its troubled past.

name: Rebots
description:
Rebots is where complex automation systems meet wacky!
As a new employee at Rebots Corporation, you’re sent to the remote Asteroid Field to help quirky aliens settle on their rocky little land of choice. They’ve got sass and character, but most importantly, they’ve got a LOT of needs for you to fulfill!

With a bunch of tools, robots, and gizmos, you’ll be able to terraform those dull rocks into flourishing lands. Travel through diverse biomes, gather resources, set up production lines, and get that money rolling into the bank account!

name: Necro Story
description: A creature-collection RPG where you play as a powerful necromancer. Summon hordes of undead and upgrade your necromancy spells to defeat your enemies. Capture their souls to enlist them in your team, and sign pacts with demons to gain their tremendous powers.

name: Lost in Sky: Violent Seed
description: Lost in Sky is an intense story-telling action platformer. Combine main characters' abilities to solve puzzles, break through the levels filled with horrible mutants, and challenge bosses!

name: Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Party 4 Deluxe
description: Mario Party 4 Deluxe is a mod of Mario Party 4 that expands the game by changing its item roster to one of a whopping 36 items. Does the Mini-Mega system get tiresome pretty quickly? Well, here's more items to play with to spice up the Mario Party 4 experience! Returning, important staples from the Mario Party series that were absent in vanilla Mario Party 4, include Mushrooms, Golden Mushrooms, Skeleton Keys and Plunder Chests! The items from Mario Party 3 are back, too; the Reverse Mushroom, Cellular Shopper, and Bowser Phone are now at your disposal. Items from newer Mario Parties and the Mario Party 1 dice blocks have also made their way into this mod, as well as 5 rare items that you can get if you're lucky enough (including the dreaded Wacky Watch)!

name: Touching Cloth At The End Of Time
description: 7 brand new detailed Limit Removing maps for Doom 2, made using Stock textures only. The premise is simple...kill the hoards of demons and escape. There's just one small problem...you're touching cloth. Better get moving before the unthinkable happens. As you massacre the hoards, you ask yourself the burning question...."should farts have lumps in them?"

name: 100 Waiting Cats: Extra Content
description:
By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Waiting Cats.
Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Cyber Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Shrew
description: You are an Etruscan Shrew, the smallest mammal in the animal kingdom. The animal cave is rumored to hold your great grandpa’s treasure. And you’re going to find it.

name: Gob
description: eat what is smaller than you type game

name: A Dark Forest
description: An incremental experimental idle/clicker horror game.

name: Realm of Dissonance
description: A seven level episode for Quake, using the original texture set from the base game. Includes a secret level, and has support for Deathmatch and Co-Op, (although NOT fully tested, as it was designed primarily with SP in mind).

name: Idumea
description: This is a re-release of Doom 2 in City Only MAP23 - Idumea, now including an additional version for lower and mid-range computers. A very large and non-linear MBF21-compatible (-cl 21) city map based around slaughter combat.

name: Haunting: The Rosefield Manor
description: Haunting: The Rosefield Manor is a carefully designed single-player psychological horror game powered by Unreal Engine 5. The spirit of Rosefield Manor still lingers, and it is up to you to uncover its mystery.

name: 3:33 A.M.
description: 3:33 A.M. is a 33 map Halloween Horror megawad designed to creep and crawl with precisely 333 lines per map and a build time of 13 days.

name: 100 Waiting Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the funny waiting situations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artworks of While Waiting themed locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. ️ Can you find them all? ️

name: Silent Hill 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition - Contents: SILENT HILL 2, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Pyramid Head Mask (pizza box).

name: Reblica
description: Reblica is a cyberpunk-style action platformer shooting game. In Ark, a city full of chaos and crime, become the mercenary Bianna, defeat various enemies and complete quests.

name: Ghostbane
description: GHOSTBANE is a game where you act as Paranormal Hunters. Your mission is to identify and neutralize various types of ghosts appearing in different locations. You can try your luck alone, but it's better to work in teams of 2-4 people. Solve this paranormal world using your equipment. Identify the types and beliefs of ghosts. By doing so, you can perform a ritual and trap them. Remember, teamwork and utilizing the strengths of each team member will shape your success. Are you ready, hunters?

name: Connected through fate
description: Romatic and dramatic Otome Game

name: Landorus Therian Dating Simulator
description: A humorous, and also heartwarming love story between an unassuming player and competitive Pokémon's fallen legendary fighter, Landorus-Therian.

name: Pony Kart DS
description: Pony Kart DS is a mod of Mario Kart DS that contains 12 custom characters (each with 1 custom kart), 16 custom tracks (replacing the retro tracks from Mario Kart DS) and has most items edited to fit in more with MLP.

name: Sister Lumina and the Hypnosis Cult
description: When Lumina is forced to open a forbidden book passed down by her grandmother in order to rescue her best friend, she will have to pay a hefty price to gain the power to free her and ensure her safety.

name: Battow: Mages And Monsters
description: Battow - Mages And Monsters is a bouncing bullet game, the player clicks somewhere on the screen for the Mage to throw a spell in that direction. The spell bounces off the walls of the scene, and the player will need to use this to their advantage to hit the rival. Every time the player collects a chest or shield, he is protected for one round, that is, will defend himself if he is hit by the monster's spell. It's a relaxing atmosphere game, simple and easy to play. There are 5 Mages, 20 monsters and 100 levels.

name: The Campsite
description:
The Campsite is a short point-and-click adventure game, inspired by and crafted in the style of early genre classics, and adapted for a modern-day experience.

If you have a passion for graphic adventures but never find the time to play, this might be exactly what you’re looking for.

With about 60 minutes of gameplay, a simplified UI, and no dialogue trees, it is an excellent choice for casual players. It can be played anytime, alone or with others, and is suitable for all ages.

For those new to classic point-and-click adventures, The Campsite is a great starting point. Featuring a balanced difficulty level and lighter gameplay, it offers an accessible and enjoyable experience for beginners, and hopefully, you’ll be captivated by the magic that makes this genre so special!

name: Dating Killmulator
description: Step into a world where dating goes beyond your typical choices. In this game, you’ll find yourself navigating a twisted, darkly humorous universe filled with popular guys, nice guys, and serial killers. This isn't your standard dating game; it’s a wild parody that plays with every dating sim trope, flipping it on its head.

name: Taiyaki Fabulous Museum of Fish
description: Welcome to Fishcross Island! Explore the land and water, meet weird characters, and solve nonogram puzzles for items and progress. Will you gain the Power of 7 Fish and meet Chad face-to-face in the Taiyaki Fabulous Museum of Fish?

name: Haunting Record: Sins of Lust
description: This is a walking simulator with elements of horror and suspense. You are trapped in an endless corridor, where eerie events keep unfolding, as if something is trying to stop you from escaping...

name: Color Water Sort: Time Attack Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Memories: Sofia Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Life Bubble: Speed Up Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Combo Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Defense: Fruity Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Traffic Manager: Upgrade Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Duake
description:
Gaming enthusiast and developer Magic Nipples has released Duake (Doom in Quake). It's a Quake mod featuring the main character (Doomguy) and the original Doom weapons.

"Run through the Quake campaign as Doomguy. It's that easy!" the project's creator explained in the description of the Duake mod.

In addition to the Doom Slayer, the first version of Quake in the Duake mod featured a full arsenal of weapons from Doom, as well as an original interface in two versions (classic and compact from Doom 64).

The mod's source code is published on GitHub. The mod's developer has promised to make further improvements to the project.

name: Guess Where You Are
description: GuessWhereYouAre.com is an immersive, free-to-play geography guessing game where players are dropped into a random location and must guess where they are in the world.

name: Horn and Shields
description: Sin descripción

name: Amarillo's Butt Slapper
description: Slap it. Turn it. Slap it again. This incredible simulation of the human butt will leave you dizzy with all that bounce. It's an autoclicker, but instead of click, it slap. Way better imo.

name: Last Rollbug
description:
You are Beetle, a small rollbug who does some platforming stuff and also experiences horrors beyond its comprehension.
The rest of these tiny creatures have gone missing, will Beetle be able to find them, or will something else find them first?

name: Beauty and the Beast: The New Adventure
description: After breaking the first curse that transformed the Prince into a Beast, the tranquility is interrupted when a magical force stops time.

name: Marble Flow
description: Solve the puzzle and make the marbles flow

name: Submarine Bubble
description: What would you do if you were a bubble and had to gather as many stars as possible? But in this adventure, it won’t be that simple.

name: Ukosz
description: Survive in a post-soviet style brutalist city...

name: Wordpieces
description: Wordpieces is a word connect puzzle game where you have to connect the word pieces in the right order to reveal the hidden inspirational quote.

name: Mouth Trap
description: Mouth Trap is a retro-style arcade game where your aim is to eat as much food as you can. But watch out for those pesky germs that get in your way! Lots of treats can help (or hinder) you in your mission to complete over 100 levels of fun. Can you become a "Champion Chomper"?

name: Interstellar Pioneering
description: Interstellar Pioneering is a casual game where players collect energy gems in the starry sky, expand their territory, and gather resources. Recruit fairy helpers to assist in collecting and managing resources, balancing expansion and consumption to create a vast starry world.

name: Flappy Bird
description: Flappy Bird is back and he is refreshed, reinvigorated, and ready to soar again.

name: Farm Champions: Harvest Battle
description: A unique blend of classic snake gameplay and harvesting simulators. Try out these new battle arenas and prove you are the one and only champion.

name: Bot Loop
description: Embark on a roguelike turn-based adventure where simulations become your battleground. Possess a powerful robot, face the Glitch and navigate an ever-evolving loop of challenges.

name: Warlords of the Deck
description: We've fused Card Gaming with the Battle of Total War to create the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Combine a unique deck from different factions, rally your legions, and charge to defeat all your opponents!

name: Hero's Warband
description: Embark on an epic journey in Hero’s Warband, a captivating 2D Survival Autobattler. Recruit and manage a diverse array of heroes with unique classes and skills. Discover the perfect synergy between classes to suit your strategic vision. Lead your heroes to greatness in tactical battles!

name: PolyZ
description: Explore a world devastated by apocalypse, teeming with the infected. Scavenge for survival amid scarcity, competing for resources. Will you trust in alliances for safety or brave the dangers alone? This is your journey in PolyZ (PVP/PVE).

name: The Killing Antidote
description: In the future, pharmaceutical company, X-Gene created a dangerous, monster making virus. Jodi, a fearless investigative journalist, is going to get to the bottom of this and doesn't care who's at the top!

name: Sex & Blood: Vampires
description: Sex & Blood: Vampires is an engaging adult visual novel set in a mysterious future world. In this realm, humanity contends with vampires who have eerily blended in with ordinary people, concealing their true nature.

name: Shadow of the Orient
description: Ready to do battle with evil and save the day? Shadow of the Orient is a 2d pixel art action adventure platformer game with fully customizable touch controls, fluid movement and smooth animations. Explore vast levels filled with secrets, quests and loot. Fight your way through hordes of samurai enemies and mythological creatures using your Dao sword or fight off enemies at a distance with ranged weapons.

name: Spelly Cat
description: Solve word puzzles. Rescue your owner. Get fed!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E.: Complete Bundle
description: The gun-wielding badass is back, evolved, more stylish and better than ever! Become Grave, a resurrected gunslinger and ruthless anti-hero set within a beautiful third-person action shooter.

name: Outbreak: Phantasmagoria Collection
description: A horrifying tale across retro-infused next-gen survival horror nightmares!

name: Ballotron Galaxy
description:
Discover the newest challenge in your favorite arcade!
Blast off into space and put your skills to the test once again.
Shoot small balls to strike larger balls and blocks.
