Uncover creative solutions to connect the blue and green ball.
Experiment with unique strategies to overcome challenging, logic-based puzzles.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Hotel Hustle: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Go Kart Mania: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Shop Manager Simulator
description: Take charge of your own retail outlet. Stack shelves with products, hire staff, set prices, appease the customers, manage suppliers, expand your space. Grow from a little store into a massive supermarket.

name: Arena
description: This is an arena FPS set in a futuristic setting in which the objective is to decimate armies of robots.

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream - Character Pass Vol. 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream - Demon King Costume Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Ngolf: GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Remute: Dreammachine
description: After highly acclaimed and unique game console albums for SNES, Mega Drive, Jaguar, N64, Gameboy or even 3DO, the German electronic music producer Remute presents his most ambitious work to date: Together with his long-standing cooperator and amazing graphic artist Alien^PDX he created Dreammachine - a full CGI feature film inviting you to a deep dream journey filled to the brim with psychedelic sequences, epic animations and a strangely meditative ambient soundtrack.

name: Skibidi Sandbox
description: Skibidi Sandbox is a sandbox game where you can have lots of fun. This includes spawning items such as Skibidi Toilet so you can shoot it or you can blow it up by spawning in rockets. Skibidi Sandbox is the perfect game to have some action. There are also two maps you can explore and have some fun shooting/blowing things up and finding secrets. This is the perfect game for you if you want to have some skibidi fun.

name: Shinmai Kyoushi
description: Sin descripción

name: Smash simulator
description: Is life full of infinite pressure and helplessness, but nowhere to vent Is reality filled with countless injustices and grievances, yet nowhere to confide in Come to this virtual world and release yourself!

name: Fashion Princess: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Knights & Guns: Infinite Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kinki Spiritual Affairs Bureau
description:
This game is not a classic Japanese horror game where you can't fight back against the ghosts.

In Kinki Spiritual Affairs Bureau, you're just as much of a threat as the spirits themselves!

name: Horror Clash
description: Sin descripción

name: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
description: In this new adventure, Alice returns to Wonderland only to discover that time is out of control. Clocks stop, and the entire kingdom seems to be plunged into temporal chaos.

name: Princess Jigsaw Bundle
description: Jigsaws filled with wonder and magic. They include princesses and puppies

name: Wilt
description: You're a little slime and there's one thing you love more than anything else: rubies! But it's not good for your health: you're wilting fast from eating them! This is a 30 stage platformer where you need to plan how you pick up collectibles to win.

name: Corrida das Blogueiras 6: A Maldição dos Zumbis
description: In this exciting game, you will face 8 super challenging stages, all set in the glamorous Corrida Das Blogueiras High School! Run through the corridors, jump over obstacles, defeat zombies and show that you have the charisma to be the school's Ultimate Blogger!

name: Callous
description: 1 large map for vanilla Doom 2 using alpha textures.

name: Outposts of the Wasteland
description: Outposts Of The Wasteland is a new episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports (complevel 2) made by various members of Doomer Boards. This project theme was inspired by the Mad Max and Borderlands franchises.

name: Courting Death
description: Life at Midsommar University has been rather mundane; you mostly bum around campus and go out drinking with your roommate Lin on the weekends. At the end of an extended bender, you meet a girl who delivers to you something you could have never imagined: you've been cursed to die come Friday.

name: Echoes of a Turnabout: Franziska von Karma
description: When a heavy snowstorm shuts down the city, the Wright Anything Agency asks a friend already at the scene of the crime to investigate...

name: Bussy Master: Halloween Advent 2024
description: Surrender to the allure of Bussy Master: Halloween 2024! Encounter seductive zombies, irresistible demons, sultry vampires, haunting werewolves, sinister evil clowns, mysterious masked killers and lots more! Let your deepest fantasies awaken in this thrilling puzzle adventure. 🧩

name: Mechanines Tower Defense
description: Position your EvoDogs against the threats of a machine-dominated future and enjoy this TOWER DEFENSE game with ROGUE-LITE elements!

name: Lost Diskettes Vol. 1
description: This is a collection of short and experimental horror experiences, focused on surreal and bizarre plots.

name: Magic Archery
description: Train a commoner to become the greatest archer in this short incremental game! Increase your stats, buy upgrades, infuse your arrows with magic, and gather clout from quests.

name: BlightFog
description: Journey across a dying world. Manage your resources. Build relationships with anthropomorphic characters. Find a new home or become a fuel drinking madman.

name: Math Genius: Addition Edition
description: Math Genius: Addition Edition is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated addition problems. Players fill in the missing number in the equation by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening math skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Aradia's Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro Horror Story
description: Embark on a heart-pounding journey through a cursed maze in this thrilling survival horror game. Evade a terrifying monster and solve intricate puzzles to uncover dark secrets. Can you escape the nightmare?

name: Citadale: The Accursed Seal
description: The dark lord Rhogul is about to be resurrected and the only man capable of stopping him is dying. Explore a vast open world in this action game with metroidvania elements and join Arion Dorleac in his final days for one last time...

name: Infinite Library
description: Your mission is to protect the library from imminent danger. Navigate through treacherous puzzles using ancient books that allow you to manipulate the laws of physics.

name: Hide 'N Seek!: Friends DLC
description: The Friends DLC expands your in-game experience with new content to explore. Elevate your character's appearance with 8 animal-themed skins and enhance your journey further by adopting 4 unique squirrel companions to faithfully join you on your endeavors. This DLC also provides a generous 5,000 extra in-game coins.

name: Hide 'N Seek!: Foes DLC
description: Embrace the eerie atmosphere of Halloween with the Spooky Season DLC, unlocking an array of thrilling new content to elevate your gaming experience. Adorn your character in 8 chilling skins, personalize your adventure with 4 wolf-themed pets, and ensure you have the resources to fully customize your spooky setup with 5,000 extra in-game coins.

name: Hide 'N Seek!
description: Prepare to experience a high-stakes twist on the classic game of hide and seek with Extreme Hide and Seek. Dive into the action as you choose to either hide from or seek out your opponents. If you opt to hide, blend seamlessly into the environment, stay silent, and outsmart the Seeker to secure victory. Or, take on the role of the Seeker, counting down before setting off to find and capture all the elusive Hiders. With heart-pounding gameplay that puts a thrilling spin on the beloved childhood pastime, Extreme Hide and Seek challenges players to master the art of concealment or the thrill of the hunt.

name: Macho Shot
description: Merge Machos, a fast-paced merging puzzle game, challenges players to grow their Machos by combining like types, while carefully avoiding letting them overflow off the play field. Reach for new high scores as you master the art of Macho merging. Compete against friends in multiplayer modes, with support for up to 4 players using shared Joy-Con controllers. In Score Attack, increase your score and aim for the top of global leaderboards or battle head-to-head, strategically blocking each other out to be the last Macho standing.

name: Cadence
description: Immerse yourself in a unique blend of rhythmic combat and challenging boss fights. In this top-down action game, each of the 10 bosses move, attack, and change patterns in sync with the music, demanding precise timing and quick reactions. You'll need to read their rhythmic cues, dodge, and strike in harmony with the beat to survive. With every encounter, the music guides the flow of battle, creating an intense, immersive experience where combat feels like part of the soundtrack. Master the rhythm, adapt to dynamic patterns, and overcome difficult fights in this distinctive rhythmic boss-rush.

name: Wild Hunter: Sniper Rifle Adventures Simulator
description: Track your prey. Feel the suspense. Become a legendary hunter!

name: Rhythmscapes
description:
Guided by an inner-rhythm spirit, take part in rhythm practices set within immersive visual environments. Enhance your focus and coordination while discovering the essence of your rhythm. Engage in drumming sessions driven by the science of human emotions - all of this is achieved with just your bare hands, and no controllers are needed.

Rhythmscapes makes a groundbreaking leap, synthesizing mindfulness and rhythm-based game mechanics into a single therapeutic experience within immersive VR.

name: NeveRossa: Mille e una notte
description: That day, the sky was also snowing scarlet— Classic PC game from Firedog Studio in 2005 "NeveRossa~Mille e una notte" Remastered! Nurture a pretty girl Lilies, the "Goddess Seed", through trainings, adventures, and battles, into a true Goddess within a thousand nights!

name: Offroad Quest Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Norikire! Hina-chan Stamp
description: The genre of this game is similar to a deck-building rogue game.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Patrick Star Game
description: Patrick fans, your time has come – and Bikini Bottom is your open-world playground! You can skydive with just a parasol (or nothing at all), search for buried treasure in the Dump, or release the rage in Mrs. Puff’s Rage Room. Use almost any item you find, - from the reef blower to a paint can, - to make the world more Patrick. And take on challenges only Patrick would attempt, set by up SpongeBob, Sandy Cheeks, Mr. Krabs, and more. So become the Star of the show, put your silliest ideas into action, and enjoy the physics-based chaos that unfolds all around you!

name: NHL 25
description: From the modernized skating of Next-Gen Vision Control and an overhaul of Chel’s AI player movement to authentic Reactive Action animations — experience true hockey intelligence.

name: Stellarcraft
description: Stellarcraft is a captivating sci-fi tower defense game that delves deep into the vast expanses of the universe, offering players the opportunity to explore planets, gather resources, and defend against numerous threats.

name: Zero the Kamikaze Squirrel
description:
Who said bad guys cannot be heroes? Aero the Acro-Bat’s infamous enemy comes for some ninja squirrel action with an adventure of his own!

While working on Edgar Ektor’s evil plan, Zero receives a letter from his girlfriend telling him their forest is in danger and her father has been kidnapped. When he tells Edgar that he needs to go to protect his forest, Edgar refuses, but Zero’s leaves without permission.

Now Zero needs to head back to his forest as soon as possible, but the evil madman Edgar Ektor doesn’t take a no for an answer and is not planning to make it easy for the hero to go save his beloved forest...

name: Dirty League
description: Assemble a team of 5 daring girls and compete against other heroes in captivating match-3 team battles. Discover the best combination among hundreds of abilities and effects that will help you rise to the top of the Pleasure Tower and claim the throne of the universe’s greatest champion!

name: Peech World
description: An action - packed turn based bullet hell RPG. Explore and save a vibrant world!

name: Lore of the Frog
description: You are a frog archaeologist on a journey to the elusive Frog island. Cozy hiking adventure in a magical forest with casual puzzles, ancient frog statues... And put hats on frogs!

name: Dungeon Mercenaries
description: Dungeon Mercenaries is an endless replayability RPG. Every time you wake up, it's a new start, procedurally generated map, randomly generated characters,explore the dungeon with different mercenaries, get reasure chests, gold coins, mercenaries, potions, food, and glory!

name: Employee Rules of the Night Strings
description: This is a bartender simulation game. While mixing drinks that satisfy customers, you also need to carefully identify whether the guests in front of you are human or something similar to human.

name: Golf Club Nostalgia + The Cub Bundle
description: A ruined Earth won’t ruin your fun in this bundle! In Golf Club Nostalgia, return to a desolate Earth for a few rounds of golf. After all, that’s what rich people do right?

name: Metamorphosis + What the Duck Bundle
description: Strange is the new normal in this bundle! In Metamorphosis, you are Gregor, a man who wakes up and finds he has mysteriously been transformed into a bug. Navigate a world that has become hauntingly stretched and unfamiliar.

name: Tools Up! + Ready, Steady Ship! Bundle
description: Bring your best pair of work gloves for this bundle! In Tools Up!, the objective is fix, paint, move furniture and otherwise have a chaotic time! Take on the task solo, but 4 player co-op is where the action is.

name: Booster Racers
description: Are you ready to show your competitiveness? Here is Booster Racers, a chaotic racing game that you can play together with a friend in local multiplayer, or you can play alone too if you have no friends.

name: KBF: Knight Bar Fight
description: Play as a squire defending his knight's honor in this versus couch game for 2 to 4 players. Eliminate your opponents by touching them with your sword, complete quests to satisify the tavern crowd and win the final victory !

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream
description: In this online co-op action game, enter a distorted version of the SWORD ART ONLINE world. Pick your role in the form of favorite SWORD ART ONLINE characters and team up with 20 players for raids to defeat powerful enemies.

name: Stack & the Grumblepuff from Above
description: Play as a stack of blobs with an addiction to coins - it's really in your best interest to avoid the hazards - but how else will you collect all the treasure? And where are those hazards falling from?

name: DitherDream
description: A trippy little exploration game. Let the world guide you through a strange and uniquely beautiful archipelago.

name: Until Dawn
description:
A remake of Until Dawn, an interactive drama survival horror video game originally released in 2015.

The remake features overhauled visuals, new camera controls, prologue rework, new collectables, new areas and interactions, and a new "Stay Calm" mechanic.

name: Atlas Ablaze
description: When 16 year old Andi falls for the last person her parents would approve of, she seems to have trouble processing the severity of her girlfriend's situation. Cute visuals and crude humor helps to mask dark topics in the way that puts you in the headspace of a teenage girl trying to shut it all out.

name: Grunn
description: A gardener gets hired to do some maintenance work over the weekend. The tall grass needs to be cut, the wild hedges trimmed, and the dead flowers could use some water. A simple task, but strangely some tools are missing…The owner of the garden isn't around, and their house is off-limits. Perhaps new tools can be found in the mysterious town, or maybe some of the reserved townsfolk have seen them?

name: Date With the Night
description: Ben O'Hara and his new assistant Yuhiko Kosuke have a Date With the Night in this Noir Survival Horror. Choose your character to investigate a new thrilling case in the sequel to the critically acclaimed cult hit Ghost at Dawn. Navigate your way through unspeakable horrors in an abandoned apartment building while piecing together clues to solve how so many people suddenly went missing.

name: Combat Complex
description: Combat Complex is a fast-paced sci-fi action RPG. You are alone against hordes of enemies. Wield legendary weapons, level up your stats, unlock devastating talents and abilities. Think quick, move fast, outsmart your enemies!

name: Potion Tycoon
description: Potion Tycoon is a management simulator with a witchy twist! Build and develop your very own magic shop. Manage resources, set up production lines, mix potions and sell them smartly to stay ahead of the competition. Welcome to the potion business!

name: Gunsmith Simulator
description: Become a gunsmith and work in your own workshop! Craft parts and make popular weapons with them. Repair and upgrade weapons in a state of damage.

name: Diplomacy is Not an Option
description: In the RTS-game “Diplomacy is Not an Option” you will become a medieval feudal lord in a midlife crisis. Due to your position you must constantly make hundreds of decisions a day related with city management and economic development. You are tired of this monotonous and, so it seems, meaningless existence. But things are about to change: hordes of bloodlusted enemies, swarms of scary monsters and crowds of rebellious peasants at any second can bring some life to your working schedule.

name: Within the Cosmos
description: Within the Cosmos is a single-player first-person sci-fi RPG. You awaken from cryogenic sleep, and shortly after, you and your crew get attacked by an unknown enemy. As you explore multiple planets to try to find answers, your choices and actions will determine how the story unfolds.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack
description:
Bear the colours of the Ultramarines Successor Chapters with the Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack!

This DLC contains more than 30 cosmetic items and options from 12 Ultramarines chapters.

name: Full Throttle Pixel Racing
description: Top down racing fun in a pixel art world where brakes are not needed !

name: Escape from the Dungeon
description: Help Anthony overcome the traps and find the way out of the dungeon before it's too late!

name: Deceit 2: Master Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Storm the Swan
description: Make Cute Animal Friends in this 8-bit Gameboy-inspired adventure! But there's something lurking in the woods, with DARK SECRETS you'll need to uncover!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Fluffy Lailaps"
description: Sin descripción

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Floral Town-Wear Set: Brown
description: Sin descripción

name: Finn Dorset's Institute For Livestock Replication
description: An animated incremental game about cloning livestock. Make as many moon sheep as you can. Research technology, upgrade your operation and become a clone farm billionaire!

name: Mystery Escape Room Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Crowded Mysteries 2: Winter Romance
description: Unleash your inner detective in Crowded Mysteries 2 Winter Romance, an icy sequel where winter's chill adds a thrilling twist to crime-solving. Have fun as you unravel mysteries, collect clues, and find out what love and broken hearts can make people do, in the snow-covered Mystery City!

name: Brawl Stars: Season 31 - Scary Tales
description: Sin descripción

name: Throw M
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost in the Mirrors
description: Enter a mysterious mirror maze. Your cleaning job becomes a survival game as darkness falls. Mirrors reflect your fears, creating eerie illusions. Grasp your cleaning tools and wipe away stains - it's your only escape route. Clear all stains to flee this maze. Dare to face "Lost in the Mirrors"?

name: Spy Guy: Detective Games Bundle (3 in 1)
description: Three games of hidden objects = three times more fun!

name: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter & Republic Commando Bundle
description: The Star Wars: Bounty Hunter & Republic Commando Bundle gives you two action-packed Star Wars games for one price! The Bundle Includes: STAR WARS: Bounty Hunter Bring in your bounty, dead or alive.

name: Formula Racing: Grand Prix League
description: Every turn defines a champion!

name: Coloring Book: Mandalas
description: Discover the fascinating world of colouring mandalas for adults and children. Escape from stress with amazing designs and a wide range of colours, creating your own artistic creations.

name: Perfect Klondike Solitaire
description: Prepare to test your strategic solitaire abilities!

name: Summer Tri-Peaks Solitaire
description: Amazing Tri-Peaks Solitaire fun for whole family!

name: Video Game Store: Supermarket Simulator
description: Video Game Store: Stock, Shop, Succeed!

name: Who Dies First?
description: You will be put into silly and funny situations in real life where you have to predict who will die first. Try to predict as many correct as possible to get the highest IQ score. Compete with other players in intelligence.

name: Exploding Kittens VR
description:
Play with up to five players online or against bots and strategically force your opponents to draw the dreaded Exploding Kitten and be the last person standing to win. Customize your own in-game avatars, explore the social hub and dive into a variety of entertaining mini-games.
Interact With Your Favorite Card Game Like Never Before: A VR strategy game experience to socialize with friends and make new enemies.

name: Gaming Cafe Simulator
description: Revive a closed-down gaming café and build it into the ultimate gaming hub! Manage rentals, sell gaming merch, and expand with PCs, consoles, and an in-house café to prepare and sell fresh food. Attract customers with unique gaming sections. Can you turn your dream café into a bustling success?

name: TransMemory
description: I woke up in a dimly lit basement. You have no memory of who you are or why you are here. Can you escape from this place?

name: Minimal Slide
description: Minimal Slide is a sliding puzzle game where you have to strategically move tiles to reach the goal in as few moves as possible. Beat levels of increasing difficulty and unlock ways to customize how the game looks and sounds!

name: Summon: Joint Escape
description: Summon: Joint Escape is a cooperative horror survival game for 1-4 players. Find a way to escape from a stalker in camouflage uniform who wants to give you a piece of paper with the inscription "Summon".

name: Schizophrenia: The Last Shift
description: Remembering the past while corruption occurs, you are set out to finish the remainder of your shift until you cannot anymore. Stock the shelves using your forklift and be a productive member of society while evading the inner demons within you in this horror survival to meet quota.

name: Rabbiman Adventures
description: Rabbiman Adventures is a charming 3D platformer about a small and brave hero named Yasha. Uncover the mysteries of the secret room and help your friends to save the magic forest. Interesting puzzles and many exciting acrobatic challenges await you!

name: An Unexpectedly Green Journey
description: From birth to death, craft your orc's legacy. Wield the powers of a shaman or chief. Conquer the world. Become a god or a demon lord. Do what orcs do best!

name: Dragon Takers
description: "Rise, those who resist the dragons—"

name: Guardians of the Sanctree
description: You and allies, avian inhabitants of Sanctree City, build structures and production lines on the tree, crafting weapons to fend off subterranean insects. Defense is just the start—dig deeper, destroy nests, fortify new defenses against escalating threats for an impregnable stronghold.

name: Elara's Light
description: Elara's Light is a relaxing, yet punishing 2D precision platformer. Every jump tests perseverance and precision—one mistake could drag Elara back into the darkness. Uncover the stories of the forsaken, and guide Elara toward the light she longs for.

name: Combat Directive: Napoleonic Wars
description:
Inspired by legendary classic wargames , Combat Directive brings the strategic depth and ideological brilliance of these classics to life, reimagining the monumental battles of the Napoleonic Wars. It's crafted for the true enthusiasts of historical warfare.

Join the ranks of history's greatest generals and redefine the outcomes of the most significant battles of the Napoleonic era. All it takes is a strategic mind and the will to command. Dive into our game now on Steam and lead your troops to glory!

Dive into 6 detailed campaigns each representing a pivotal phase of the Napoleonic Wars — from Preussisch-Eylau in 1807 to the battles of 1814. Each campaign offers a series of battles that shaped the course of history, bringing over 150 missions to your screen.

Each mission showcases a historical battlefield with meticulously positioned army regiments, bringing military history battle maps directly to your screen. Historical accuracy meets tactical gameplay here, where the positioning and terrain play as much a role as your regiments and decisions.

We've meticulously recreated the authentic design of Napoleonic Wars-era army regiments, complete with historically accurate uniforms and capabilities. It's not just about classifying units as infantry, cavalry, or artillery; it’s about the unique history of each specific regiment, which can significantly impact their role on the battlefield.

To provide full immersion of battlefield command, we’ve combined turn-based elements like hexagonal grid movement with the simultaneous actions characteristic of RTS. This results in gameplay with a more deliberate pace, where quick reflexes aren’t essential—only a keen strategic mind.

Leverage historical formations like squares, columns, or skirmish lines to gain tactical advantages on the battlefield. Transform your units dynamically to suit the unfolding tactical scenario. With a system designed to minimize randomness, predict the outcome of your strategies and attacks with high accuracy, similar to traditional tabletop wargaming.

name: The Vanishing
description: The Vanishing is first person horror game. Explore an abandoned town where shadows whisper and secrets lie buried deep. Uncover the truth behind a vengeful spirit awakened from an ancient slumber. Solve puzzles, face your fears, and survive a mystery that claimed so many before you. Can you escape?

name: 1000 Questions Quiz! National Flag
description:
Let's memorize flags by solving 1000 questions!
If you solve all of them, you will be a flag master!

name: Block & Shot
description: Dive into the fascinating world of logic puzzles, where you have to control various weapons.

name: Eggconsole Silver Ghost PC-8801mkIISR
description: A masterpiece that brilliantly merges simulation and RPG genres with a medieval backdrop. Will the prince be able to reclaim Camelot Castle!?

name: Pour Cappuccino 1000
description:
Solve the puzzle and make a cappuccino.
A puzzle game where you rotate pipes to connect them.

name: Picross Records of The Shield Hero
description:
Picross is a beloved picture crossword puzzle game where players follow hint numbers to complete a picture. Fans of The Rising of the Shield Hero and Picross enthusiasts alike will find plenty to enjoy in this collaborative offering.

The Rising of the Shield Hero anime series is now available as a puzzle game! Picross and The Rising of the Shield Hero anime series are collaborating to bring fans an exciting new experience. The game features an Episode mode that allows you to relive the adventures of Naofumi, Raphtalia, Filo, and their friends while solving puzzles. In addition to the classic Picross, Mega Picross, and Color Picross from the Picross S series, the game also introduces Clip Picross and Extra modes that recreate famous scenes from the anime using large puzzles. The total number of puzzles is impressive, with 166 each for Picross and Mega Picross, four for Clip Picross, and more than 40 piece puzzles each for a total of 175 puzzles, 47 puzzles for Color Picross, and eight for Extra.

name: Rolling Football Player
description: Rolling Football Player is a bizarre athletic game where an eternally rolling soccer player takes on athletic challenges! Push your limits in single-player mode!

name: Periculum
description: Periculum is a casual strategy game about conquering hexagonal tiles. Engage in battles against up to 7 bots or challenge your friends to see who comes out on top. With plenty of different game modes and options.

name: Gnomes and Knights
description: Gnome hunting reaches a new level! Become a mighty knight and plunge into the world of dark fantasy without leaving your home.

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Jeju Island-2
description: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: Harbinger
description: Harbinger brings the chaos of '90s boomer shooters into the modern era. Carve your way through waves of enemies in brutal combat arenas and regroup at the tavern to upgrade your arsenal. Enter the Harbinger Realm and leave nothing in your wake!

name: Climb Quest
description: Climb Quest is a challenging vertical platformer where you navigate through a fragmented world of floating islands, overcoming devious traps and solving intricate puzzles. Your goal is to ascend to the top, close the source of destruction alone or with your friends.

name: Parcel Escape
description: Help the little furry lump get out of this strange post office, where obstacles await at every turn.

name: Geometry Shooter
description: Geometry shooter is an arcade game that is simple to start but hard to master - shoot the cannon to break objects in the screen, but beware - each ball you shoot will expand into a new object!

name: Tekken 8: Heihachi Mishima
description: Heihachi Mishima is the third DLC character for Tekken 8 planned for release in Autumn 2024 alongside a free story update for the game that includes his return to the narrative and reveals his place in the ongoing events.

name: Pirate Hunter: Somali Trap
description: In the middle of the South Pacific: modern pirates are making the waterways that are so important for international trade unsafe. In order to deal with this ever-growing threat, a mercenary group called The Pilgrims appears on the scene, earning their money with protection missions...

name: Dull Acres
description: You strayed from the path. Now you are doomed to wander the woods.

name: Death Horizon: Cyberfusion
description: Roguelike, physics-based, full-body FPS with cybernetic implants and procedurally generated levels. Enhance your abilities with a variety of cyber implants, experience physics-based interactions, play uniquely generated game levels, upgrade any weapon at your disposal.

name: Grand Gardens
description: Grand Gardens, an enchanting 3D Walking/Exploring simulator that invites you to immerse yourself in the serene beauty of an ancient and sacred Japanese garden.

name: Revelatio
description: "Revelatio" is a turn-based strategy game that combines tile-based combat and elements of roguelike. Strategically summon and control units to claim victory. Stain the world with your darkness by corrupting various units, bosses and even NPCs.

name: SaiBorRai
description: The Meme First-Person Shoot em' up in a Cyberpunk/SteamPunk world. Find Memes, Fight Enemies such as mutants and goons. Pick up your gun, shoot anything that moves and you'll be fine

name: I*Chu: Chibi Edition
description: Guide 32 aspiring idols towards their ultimate debut. Play rhythm action games to unlock characters and create your own groups. Follow the characters’ journeys through the main story and support them through their struggles!

name: Old Market Simulator
description: Old Market Simulator is a coop bazaar adventure for 1-2 players. Dive into commerce, manage your reputation, and build your dream market together.

name: Honey Vibes
description: An otome game by Otomate set on a tropical island.

name: The Hallways
description: Hallways is a horror game, where you find yourself trapped in loops of ever-changing corridors. With a special flashlight that reveals hidden paths and objects.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom
description:
This feature-length interactive cinematic story tailored for Gundam enthusiasts, anime fans, and VR lovers alike, will offer a unique opportunity to dive deep into the heart of one of Japan's most iconic anime universes.

Set in the Universal Century, this immersive journey places you at the center of an interactive cinematic experience like no other. As the main character of your own story, you'll be able to explore the universe of Mobile Suit Gundam like never before.

name: Vestiges: Fallen Tribes
description: Vestiges: Fallen Tribes is a collectible card game mixed with an autobattler, compatible with PC and VR, and set in a tribal science-fiction universe. Build the deck representing your clan, manipulate your figurines and place them on the game board. Soldiers automatically fight until one of the armies is decimated. Use strategy to defeat your opponents!

name: Parcel Corps
description: Ditch the 9-5 and embrace the high octane life of a freelance bicycle messenger! Forget the job security, stable salary, and basic workplace rights less cool jobs offer while you ride along walls, grind rails, and startle pigeons on your way to corporation-toppling domination.

name: Wizard of Legend 2
description: Face perilous magical trials in the fast-paced rogue-lite follow-up to the acclaimed original, featuring up to 4-player co-op and vibrant new 3D visuals. Master new Arcana and elements, experiment with spell combinations, and seek immortality to become a Wizard of Legend!

name: Kvark
description: Kvark is an FPS game set in a fictional version of the 80s Czech Republic. The player finds themselves in an underground facility that is falling apart as they travel through it. They will have to navigate through dark tunnels and will encounter many obstacles and enemies that will test their skills

name: Rally
description: Gather together troops and weapons to fight through increasingly difficult armies in this rogue-like deck-building game. Establish synergies between your cards and treasures to create the strongest army!

name: Bridge Construction Simulator
description: Creativity! Logic! Construct bridges and see if they hold! Multiple levels!

name: Esports History
description: Esports adventure-tycoon with RPG elements where you will have to go through the path from an ordinary teenager to an esports star. Win tournaments, improve your character, use your time and resource wisely to prove that you are the best.

name: Paug
description: A fireball, spirits and a pyramid. What can happen? Move your racket and beat the spirit in a duel.

name: The Last Plague: Blight
description:
The Last Plague: Blight is an extremely challenging and realistic single-player top-down perspective survival game.

The game takes place in a time long ago, just as a new disease called the Blight appears out of nowhere and begins enveloping the world. You escaped as it took over your village and now find yourself alone in the wilderness, tired and hungry.

The game is for players that are looking for an immersive survival game experience with a decent amount of realism and depth. All the while trying to manage the countless threats the wilderness and the Blight throws at you.

name: Hell of an Office
description: Hell Of An Office is an intense speedrunning first person vertical platformer where you run, dash and rocket-jump your way through the world’s most hellish office. But it won't be easy; the lava is always rising!

name: Victory Heat Rally
description: An intense, retro arcade-style racer that embodies the spirit of classic 90's racing games. Experience high-speed action, vibrant retro aesthetics, and non-stop drifting thrills as you challenge friends-turned-rivals. Get ready for an exhilarating ride!

name: The Black Masses
description: The Black Masses is an open world first-person fantasy co-op RPG. The Black Masses features our next generation of crowd rendering technology rebuilt from Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator. Explore a 16 square kilometer island populated by hundreds of thousands of possessed inhabitants.

name: Monomyth
description: Monomyth is the ultimate first-person dungeon crawler, bringing back the classic virtues of the genre. Inspired by Arx Fatalis, Ultima Underworld and the King's Field series, this gripping RPG leads the player into the mighty fortress of Lysandria to recover a sacred artifact guarded by fierce enemies.

name: AK-xolotl: Together
description: The cutest, deadliest top-down roguelike shooter featuring AK-wielding Axolotls. Blast your way through the animal kingdom with an arsenal of kick-ass guns, mighty power-ups and even raise an army of trigger-happy baby axolotls. Double the firepower! Local co-op update now live!

name: Nymphomaniac: Sex Addict
description: A visually stunning story about a nymphomaniac who loves her body, sex and adrenaline. All this presented in a photorealistic audiovisual setting.

name: Madtoys Knights
description: Imagine a game where your childhood toys transform into mighty warriors, ready to defend their castle or conquer new realms. In Madtoys Knights, 32 players clash in intense battles where teamwork and cunning tactics are keys to victory.

name: Five Hearts Under One Roof
description: Yuman’s, the player, once solitary home and routine are now invaded by five beautiful women! Each has her unique charm – the 'childhood friend of 20 years,' the 'first love and former idol,' the 'demanding boss,' the 'bold younger girl,' and the 'shy recluse.' Who will you choose?

name: Arcade Archives: Moon Shuttle
description:
"Moon Shuttle" is a shooter released by Nichibutsu in 1981.
Players can enjoy alternating stages in which they destroy or dodge through groups of meteors to reach the goal, and stages in which they defeat enemies with wave motion cannons.

name: And one day everything changed...
description:
A short visual novel about miracles, adventures, friendship, and love. A game for one warm, dreamy evening with a cup of tea and cookies. And at the end of the story, a small surprise awaits in the form of mini-platformers.

The game is based on the story "And one day everything will change..." by Sveta Sky.

name: Pizza Western
description: The Death King wandered the Wild West until he found a lone bar in the desert. After ordering a pizza, a stranger entered and dared to steal it. Without hesitation, the Death King pursued, ready to destroy anything in his way—bandits, zombies, or worse.

name: MoveFort
description: Sin descripción

name: Liar's Bar
description: Liar's Bar is a 2-4 player multiplayer deception game set in a shady bar where bluffing and outsmarting your opponents is key to survival. Play Liar's Dice or Liar's Deck, choose from unique characters, and engage in high-stakes games where every lie could mean life or death. Outsmart your rivals, survive deadly rounds, and see if you can be the last one standing!

name: Bakahazard
description: Embark on a journey of several can-be-seen-everywhere ordinary students from the "Breakfast High School" saving the world, in this simple traditional turn-based RPG that makes no sense at all.

name: Damikira
description: Use your grappling hook and blast your way through hordes of weird enemies!

name: Love and Sex: Second Base - For A Fistful Of Waifu
description: For a Fistful of Waifu adds 3 new love interests to the roster of girls in Love and Sex: Second Base but that's not all! You also get a new date location and new scenes for every other girls!

name: The Dead Zone 2
description: Go to various death zones filled with unknown creatures, complete the mission at all costs, and then evacuate. Of course, we will provide various black technology blessings for everyone. Wish you good luck.

name: Legend Square
description: Rubik's Cube + Chess + Roguelike = ?Playing chess on a Rubik's Cube? And I brought a shotgun?--They say I'm not fit for this prison--A prison for the guilty--I agree--But they only got it half right--I can twist this space with ease--Leaving here is a piece of cake for me!

name: Nocturnal Relics
description: In Nocturnal relics you play as May who is trying to escape a monster while trying to get out of a museum. Is the monster in her head or did she release an ancient evil into the world?

name: Recycling Center Simulator
description: Step into 'Recycling Center Simulator,' a first-person job simulator where you spearhead a recycling operation. Navigate through neighborhoods, workshops, and factories, collecting and sorting a wide variety of materials. Transform waste into wealth by recycling and manufacturing products.

name: Kill Knight
description: KILL KNIGHT is an ultra-responsive arcade-inspired isometric action shooter. Condemned to eternal sufferance, deep within the voids of an eldritch arena, you must wield an arsenal of devastating weaponry to obliterate swarms of otherworldly horrors - and MASTER THE DEMON WITHIN.

name: Speedway Survival
description: Survive the darkest hour at UT! As Sola, defeat shadow monsters wreaking havoc on Speedway with your magical flashlight! Will you be able to rescue Sola's sister, Luna?!

name: Recipiente
description: It is a game that challenges the player's memory and quick decision making, using a scheme of colors and shapes in which the solution is to stay focused and have sharp reflexes in a spatial atmosphere that can be used to your advantage depending on its agility.

name: Kosmo Skirmish
description: Kosmo Skirmish is a multiplayer space combat game. Choose your appearance and your arsenal of 4 weapons and tools to destroy your opponents, alone or as part of a team. Up to 8 players online and/or local!

name: AzuTower
description:
AzuTower is a Pizza Tower mod that replaces some of the characters with characters from the anime Azumanga Daioh.
Starring Chiyo Mihama as Peppino, Ayumu "Osaka" Kasuga as Gustavo, and more!

name: Defender Bros
description: Prepare your defenses during the day and survive until dawn. Defender Bros is a Tower Defense roguelike game where you play as a soldier defending your base. Pick between multiple abilities as you level up to increase you survivability, then after each run buy perks and become even stronger.

name: Pinball Spire
description: Action adventure meets pinball in this one-of-a-kind pinballvania adventure. When a mysterious spire appears from thin air, it's up to an intrepid pinball to bump, spin, shoot, and flip its way to the top and solve the tower’s mysteries!

name: The Monarch
description: The Monarch is a 3D lane-defence game where you control a monarch, expand your kingdom, and defend against The Evil Queen and her undead army by strategically managing gold resources, recruiting diverse units, and exploring a world filled with mythical threats.

name: Tarnished Blood
description: Battle huge bosses, create epic frame-perfect combos, and master the innovative time manipulation system. Craft powerful weapons, make sure your civilization survives, and discover the dark secrets of the Dome.

name: The Strongest Tofu: Fragile Adventure
description: Be The Tofu, Be The Strong Tofu.

name: Room 12
description: You wake up in a place where all life forms want to kill you, and you don't remember anything. As you try to find clues about this place and your memory loss, a voice on the other end of a radio will try to help you out.

name: Of Pawns & Kings
description: "Of Pawns & Kings" is a slightly modernized, visually stunning, point&click adventure in the spirit of Monkey Island, Riven and Labyrinth. (the Jim Henson movie) Solve puzzles, combine items, talk to fascinating characters and advance in the rich story. Can you reveal all the secrets to make a stand

name: PsiloSybil
description: An old-school, tough-as nails classic linear 3D platformer with a faithful PS1 cartoony aesthetic.

name: Goldilock One: Boss Arena
description: You have just been exiled to Nebegarde, the cold and dark side of the Goldilock One planet, with a hazed memory in a place full of doomed criminals. Goldilock One is a third person Open World action RPG, that uses a mix of hack'n slash and strategy combat, co-op puzzles and sandbox elements.

name: Paint Ball
description: Tight platformer with a lot of traps, skill tests and a funny soundtrack

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Darkness Rising Starter Pack
description:
Afraid of the dark? Face your nightmares with your FREE Darkness Rising Starter Pack for World of Tanks Modern Armor!

This DLC gives you Boosters and Premium Account time for greater earnings. With this content, you'll be laughing in the face of danger!

Bundle includes:

• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (5) x2 Silver Boosters
• (5) x3 Vehicle XP Boosters
• (5) x4 Commander XP Boosters

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream - Premium Upgrade
description: The Premium Upgrade features the Wild Joker Dress and Digital Artbook & Soundtrack that can be used in SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream.

name: Constructed
description: Constructed is a third-person open-world factory building game. Explore the world and unlock new resources, create massive factories, and try to automate EVERYTHING!!! The game is being developed by a single developer and is still in EA, major future updates are planned to further enhance the gameplay.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Jungle Edition
description: Become the ultimate hunter with more ways to hunt your prey, giving you a selection of premium Predator classes to customize your look and playstyle to become feared by your foes. This bundle includes the Samurai Predator, City Hunter Predator, Viking Predator, and Valkyrie Predator premium classes.

name: Eighth Era
description: The first game of its kind, rewarding competitive players with real-life collectibles. Embark on an epic journey 10,000 years in the future in Eighth Era! Join The Collector’s Society, battle digital monsters, and uncover powerful relics as you restore life to a world on the brink of collapse. With collectible coins and thrilling challenges, every victory brings you closer to a real-world reward. Dive into the adventure and experience a turn-based RPG like no other—where your virtual journey has real-world consequences!

name: F-Zero 99: Ver. 1.5.0
description: This update added a new League, as well as new tracks based on BS F-Zero Grand Prix and unlockable decals based on machines from the Satellaview game.

name: Clue/Cluedo: Halloween Records
description:
Creep along the candlelit corridors of Tudor Mansion and seek out cryptic clues amongst grinning pumpkins and dust-speckled cobwebs…

Oh, the bats might be fake and the skeletons plastic, but the murder is horrifyingly real!

Use the spooky new Dice Set, Avatar, Card Back and Clue Sheet as you investigate the most frightful Halloween Party this year.

name: Cats With Guns
description:
Cats with Guns is a 2D casual game with rogue-lite elements, where you can make strategic decisions on the middle of the battle and go from a small kitten to a powerful and intimidating feline. Evolve your cat and overwhelm the enemy forces with powerful abilities. Fight sheer enemy numbers with a huge firepower and defeat the generals until you reach Meowstopia.

The game is set in the outskirts of Meowstopia, where cats once lived happily until it was invaded by rats, forcing them to flee. Now, a determined group of cats, known as The Nine Lives Brigade, is fighting to reclaim their city from the rat hordes. The game's premise revolves around the cats battling through waves of enemies to eventually face the leader of the rat invasion.

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Magnificent Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Forklift Simulator
description: Control various vehicles, such as forklifts, trucks, pickup trucks and take over the business. Purchase and upgrade 24 different factories, produce and sell 24 different products, even purchase the other 99 companies to rule the world!

name: Freaky Trip: Ultra Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Freaky Trip: Camp Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Freaky Trip: Garden Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Freaky Trip: Hobby Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Freaky Trip: Space Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Teddy Roller 1
description: Join Teddy on his sprawling adventure as he navigates treacherous paths and impossible hurdles. Traverse over 50 unique levels, that are sure to test even the most experienced player`s determination. Strange creatures pop up on the way, that seek to deter his plight in this retro-inspired game.

name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season 3: Season of Lawless
description: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League – Season of Lawless launched on October 1, 2024, adding Zoe Lawton (Lawless) as a playable character, a Gotham-themed Elseworld location, new missions, Infamy gear sets, and a Battle Pass. The update is available for all platforms as a free expansion.

name: You're Gonna Die 1000 Times (Or So)
description:
You have been accused of endangering the lives of 1000 people. As punishment, you will be cloned and killed 1000 times.

Can one version of you escape prison, using nothing but a match and whatever items you find around?

name: 0101: Counter Bonus Levels 1
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Counter levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Yautja Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Melon Head
description: Melon Head is a fantastical point and click adventure set in a delirious imaginary world.

name: Bomb The Town
description: Sin descripción

name: Reconquer Online
description: Play a new community-driven indie MMORPG! Train, battle, quest, and explore a dynamic world. Solve puzzles, conquer dungeons, and join epic battles with friends. Compete for top scores in a fair, pay-to-win-free environment. Your feedback shapes our development!
